contents.text: 6.1.2. AC Address
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.2. 交流地址

contents.text: The AC Address message element is defined in Section 5.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 第5.2.1节定义了交流地址信息元素。

contents.text: 6.1.3. WTP Name
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.3. WTP名称

contents.text: The WTP Name message element value is a variable-length byte string. The string is NOT zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP名称消息元素值是长度可变的字节字符串。字符串不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: Type: 5 for WTP Name
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：5表示WTP名称

contents.text: Length: > 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：>0

contents.text: Name: A non-zero-terminated string containing the WTP's name.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：包含WTP名称的非零终止字符串。

contents.text: 6.1.4. Location Data
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.4. 位置数据

contents.text: The Location Data message element is a variable-length byte string containing user-defined location information (e.g., "Next to Fridge"). The string is NOT zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置数据消息元素是一个可变长度的字节字符串，包含用户定义的位置信息（例如，“冰箱旁边”）。字符串不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: Type: 35 for Location Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：35用于位置数据

contents.text: Length: > 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：>0

contents.text: Location: A non-zero-terminated string containing the WTP's location.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置：包含WTP位置的非零终止字符串。

contents.text: 6.1.5. WTP Radio Information
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.5. 无线电信息

contents.text: A WTP Radio Information message element must be present for every radio in the WTP. This message element is defined in Section 5.1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须为WTP中的每个无线电提供WTP无线电信息消息元素。该消息元素在第5.1.3节中定义。

contents.text: 6.1.6. Certificate

The Certificate message element value is a byte string containing a DER-encoded x.509v3 certificate. This message element is only included if the LWAPP security type used between the WTP and the AC makes use of certificates (see Section 10 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: 证书消息元素值是一个字节字符串，包含DER编码的x.509v3证书。仅当WTP和AC之间使用的LWAPP安全类型使用证书时，才包括此消息元素（有关更多信息，请参阅第10节）。

contents.text: Type: 44 for Certificate
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：44证书

contents.text: Length: > 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：>0

contents.text: Certificate: A non-zero-terminated string containing the device's certificate.
contents.zh-CHS: 证书：包含设备证书的非零终止字符串。

contents.text: 6.1.7. Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.7. 会话ID

contents.text: The Session ID message element value contains a randomly generated [4] unsigned 32-bit integer.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素值包含随机生成的[4]无符号32位整数。

contents.text: Type: 45 for Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：会话ID为45

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Session ID: 32-bit random session identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID：32位随机会话标识符。

contents.text: 6.1.8. Test
The Test message element is used as padding to perform MTU discovery, and it MAY contain any value, of any length.
contents.zh-CHS: 测试消息元素用作填充以执行MTU发现，它可以包含任何长度的任何值。

contents.text: Type: 18 for Test
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：18用于测试

contents.text: Length: > 0
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：>0

contents.text: Padding: A variable-length pad.
contents.zh-CHS: 衬垫：长度可变的衬垫。

contents.text: 6.1.9. XNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1.9. XNonce

contents.text: The XNonce is used by the WTP to communicate its random nonce during the join or rekey phase. See Section 10 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用XNonce在加入或重设密钥阶段传递其随机nonce。更多信息请参见第10节。

contents.text: Type: 111 for XNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 型号：111用于XNonce

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: Nonce: 1 16-octet random nonce.
contents.zh-CHS: Nonce:1 16个八位组随机Nonce。

contents.text: 6.2. Join Response
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 加入响应

contents.text: The Join Response is sent by the AC to indicate to a WTP whether it is capable and willing to provide service to it.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入响应由AC发送，以向WTP指示其是否能够并且愿意向其提供服务。

contents.text: Join Responses are sent by the AC after receiving a Join Request. Once the Join Response has been sent, the Heartbeat timer is initiated for the session to EchoInterval. Expiration of the timer will result in deletion of the AC-WTP session. The timer is refreshed upon receipt of the Echo Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 连接响应在收到连接请求后由AC发送。一旦发送了加入响应，就会为会话启动心跳计时器，以进行EchoInterval。计时器过期将导致AC-WTP会话被删除。定时器在收到回送请求时刷新。

contents.text: If the security method used is certificate-based, when a WTP receives a Join Response, it enters the Joined state and initiates either a Configure Request or Image Data to the AC to which it is now joined. Upon entering the Joined state, the WTP begins timing an interval equal to NeighborDeadInterval. Expiration of the timer will result in the transmission of the Echo Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用的安全方法是基于证书的，则当WTP收到加入响应时，它将进入加入状态，并向其现在加入的AC发起配置请求或映像数据。进入连接状态后，WTP开始计时一个等于NeighborDeInterval的间隔。计时器过期将导致发送回显请求。

contents.text: If the security method used is pre-shared-secret-based, when a WTP receives a Join Response that includes a valid PSK-MIC message element, it responds with a Join ACK that also MUST include a locally computed PSK-MIC message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用的安全方法是基于预共享秘密的，则当WTP接收到包含有效PSK-MIC消息元素的加入响应时，它将使用加入确认进行响应，该加入确认还必须包含本地计算的PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.2.1. Result Code
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.1. 结果代码

contents.text: The Result Code message element value is a 32-bit integer value, indicating the result of the request operation corresponding to the sequence number in the message. The Result Code is included in a successful Join Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 结果代码消息元素值是32位整数值，指示与消息中的序列号对应的请求操作的结果。结果代码包含在成功的联接响应中。

contents.text: Type: 2 for Result Code
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：2表示结果代码

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Result Code: The following values are defined:
contents.zh-CHS: 结果代码：定义了以下值：

contents.text: 0 Success
contents.zh-CHS: 0成功

contents.text: 1 Failure (AC List message element MUST be present)
contents.zh-CHS: 1故障（AC列表消息元素必须存在）

contents.text: 6.2.2. Status

The Status message element is sent by the AC to the WTP in a non-successful Join Response message. This message element is used to indicate the reason for the failure and should only be accompanied with a Result Code message element that indicates a failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态消息元素由AC在非成功加入响应消息中发送到WTP。此消息元素用于指示故障原因，并且仅应与指示故障的结果代码消息元素一起使用。

contents.text: Type: 60 for Status
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：60表示状态

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Status: The Status field indicates the reason for an LWAPP failure. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：状态字段指示LWAPP失败的原因。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - Reserved - do not use
contents.zh-CHS: 1-保留-不使用

contents.text: 2 - Resource Depletion
contents.zh-CHS: 2-资源耗竭

contents.text: 3 - Unknown Source
contents.zh-CHS: 3-未知来源

contents.text: 4 - Incorrect Data
contents.zh-CHS: 4-数据不正确

contents.text: 6.2.3. Certificate
The Certificate message element is defined in Section 6.1.6. Note this message element is only included if the WTP and the AC make use of certificate-based security as defined in Section 10.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.1.6节定义了证书消息元素。注：仅当WTP和AC使用第10节中定义的基于证书的安全性时，才包括此消息元素。

contents.text: 6.2.4. WTP Manager Data IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.4. WTP管理器数据IPv4地址

contents.text: The WTP Manager Data IPv4 Address message element is optionally sent by the AC to the WTP during the join phase. If present, the IP Address contained in this message element is the address the WTP is to use when sending any of its LWAPP data frames.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP管理器数据IPv4地址消息元素在加入阶段由AC选择性地发送到WTP。如果存在，此消息元素中包含的IP地址是WTP在发送其任何LWAPP数据帧时要使用的地址。

contents.text: Note that this message element is only valid when LWAPP uses the IP/UDP Layer 3 transport.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，此消息元素仅在LWAPP使用IP/UDP第3层传输时有效。

contents.text: Type: 138 for WTP Manager Data IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：138用于WTP管理器数据IPv4地址

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address of an interface.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：接口的IP地址。

contents.text: 6.2.5. WTP Manager Data IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.5. WTP管理器数据IPv6地址

contents.text: The WTP Manager Data IPv6 Address message element is optionally sent by the AC to the WTP during the join phase. If present, the IP Address contained in this message element is the address the WTP is to use when sending any of its LWAPP data frames.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP管理器数据IPv6地址消息元素可由AC在加入阶段选择性地发送到WTP。如果存在，此消息元素中包含的IP地址是WTP在发送其任何LWAPP数据帧时要使用的地址。

contents.text: Note that this message element is only valid when LWAPP uses the IP/UDP Layer 3 transport.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，此消息元素仅在LWAPP使用IP/UDP第3层传输时有效。

contents.text: Type: 139 for WTP Manager Data IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：139用于WTP管理器数据IPv6地址

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address of an interface.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：接口的IP地址。

contents.text: 6.2.6. AC IPv4 List
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.6. AC IPv4列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is used to configure a WTP with the latest list of ACs in a cluster. This message element MUST be included if the Join Response returns a failure indicating that the AC cannot handle the WTP at this time, allowing the WTP to find an alternate AC to which to connect.
contents.zh-CHS: AC List消息元素用于使用集群中最新的AC列表配置WTP。如果连接响应返回一个故障，指示AC此时无法处理WTP，从而允许WTP找到要连接的备用AC，则必须包含此消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 59 for AC List
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：AC列表为59

contents.text: Length:   >= 4
AC IP Address: An array of 32-bit integers containing an AC's IPv4 Address.
contents.zh-CHS: AC IP地址：包含AC IPv4地址的32位整数数组。

contents.text: 6.2.7. AC IPv6 List
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.7. AC IPv6列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is used to configure a WTP with the latest list of ACs in a cluster. This message element MUST be included if the Join Response returns a failure indicating that the AC cannot handle the WTP at this time, allowing the WTP to find an alternate AC to which to connect.
contents.zh-CHS: AC List消息元素用于使用集群中最新的AC列表配置WTP。如果连接响应返回一个故障，指示AC此时无法处理WTP，从而允许WTP找到要连接的备用AC，则必须包含此消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 141 for AC List
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：141用于AC列表

contents.text: Length:   >= 4
AC IP Address: An array of 32-bit integers containing an AC's IPv6 Address.
contents.zh-CHS: AC IP地址：包含AC的IPv6地址的32位整数数组。

contents.text: 6.2.8. ANonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.8. ANonce

contents.text: The ANonce message element is sent by an AC during the join or rekey phase. The contents of the ANonce are encrypted as described in Section 10 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: ANonce消息元素由AC在加入或重新加入阶段发送。有关更多信息，请按照第10节中的说明对ANonce的内容进行加密。

contents.text: Type: 108 for ANonce
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：ANonce为108

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: Nonce: An encrypted, 16-octet random nonce.
contents.zh-CHS: Nonce：一种加密的16个八位组的随机Nonce。

contents.text: 6.2.9. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2.9. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element includes a message integrity check, whose purpose is to provide confirmation to the peer that the sender has the proper session key. This message element is only included if the security method used between the WTP and the AC is the pre-shared secret mechanism. See Section 10 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: PSK-MIC消息元素包括消息完整性检查，其目的是向对等方确认发送方拥有正确的会话密钥。仅当WTP和AC之间使用的安全方法是预共享秘密机制时，才包括此消息元素。更多信息请参见第10节。

contents.text: When present, the PSK-MIC message element MUST be the last message element in the message. The MIC is computed over the complete LWAPP packet, from the LWAPP control header as defined in Section 4.2.1 to the end of the packet (which MUST be this PSK-MIC message element). The MIC field in this message element and the Sequence Number field in the LWAPP control header MUST be set to zeroes prior to computing the MIC. The length field in the LWAPP control header must already include this message element prior to computing the MIC.
contents.zh-CHS: 存在时，PSK-MIC消息元素必须是消息中的最后一个消息元素。MIC通过完整的LWAPP数据包计算，从第4.2.1节中定义的LWAPP控制报头到数据包末尾（必须是该PSK-MIC消息元素）。在计算MIC之前，必须将此消息元素中的MIC字段和LWAPP控制标头中的序列号字段设置为零。在计算MIC之前，LWAPP控制标头中的长度字段必须已经包含此消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 109 for PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 型号：109用于PSK-MIC

contents.text: Length: > 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：>1

contents.text: SPI: The Security Parameter Index (SPI) field specifies the cryptographic algorithm used to create the message integrity check. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: SPI：安全参数索引（SPI）字段指定用于创建消息完整性检查的加密算法。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Unused
contents.zh-CHS: 0-未使用

contents.text: 1 - HMAC-SHA-1 (RFC 2104 [15])
contents.zh-CHS: 1-HMAC-SHA-1（RFC 2104[15]）

contents.text: MIC: A 20-octet Message Integrity Check.
contents.zh-CHS: 麦克风：20个八位字节的消息完整性检查。

contents.text: 6.3. Join ACK
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. 加入ACK

contents.text: The Join ACK message is sent by the WTP upon receiving a Join Response, which has a valid PSK-MIC message element, as a means of providing key confirmation to the AC. The Join ACK is only used in the case where the WTP makes use of the pre-shared key LWAPP mode (see Section 10 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在收到具有有效PSK-MIC消息元素的加入响应时发送加入确认消息，作为向AC提供密钥确认的手段。加入确认仅在WTP使用预共享密钥LWAPP模式的情况下使用（更多信息，请参阅第10节）。

contents.text: Note that the AC should never receive this message unless the security method used between the WTP and the AC is pre-shared-secret-based.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，除非WTP和AC之间使用的安全方法是基于预共享秘密的，否则AC不应接收此消息。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.3.1. Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.1. 会话ID

contents.text: The Session ID message element is defined in Section 6.1.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素在第6.1.7节中定义。

contents.text: 6.3.2. WNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.2. WNonce

contents.text: The WNonce message element is sent by a WTP during the join or rekey phase. The contents of the ANonce are encrypted as described in Section 10 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: WNonce消息元素由WTP在加入或重设密钥阶段发送。有关更多信息，请按照第10节中的说明对ANonce的内容进行加密。

contents.text: Type: 107 for WNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 型号：107一次

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: Nonce: An encrypted, 16-octet random nonce.
contents.zh-CHS: Nonce：一种加密的16个八位组的随机Nonce。

contents.text: 6.3.3. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.3. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element is defined in Section 6.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.9节定义了PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: 6.4. Join Confirm
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4. 加入确认

contents.text: The Join Confirm message is sent by the AC upon receiving a Join ACK, which has a valid PSK-MIC message element, as a means of providing key confirmation to the WTP. The Join Confirm is only used in the case where the WTP makes use of the pre-shared key LWAPP mode (see Section 10 for more information).
contents.zh-CHS: 作为向WTP提供密钥确认的一种方式，在接收到具有有效PSK-MIC消息元素的加入ACK时，加入确认消息由AC发送。加入确认仅在WTP使用预共享密钥LWAPP模式的情况下使用（有关更多信息，请参阅第10节）。

contents.text: If the security method used is pre-shared-key-based, when a WTP receives a Join Confirm, it enters the Joined state and initiates either a Configure Request or Image Data to the AC to which it is now
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用的安全方法是基于预共享密钥的，则当WTP接收到加入确认时，它将进入加入状态，并向其当前所在的AC发起配置请求或图像数据

contents.text: joined. Upon entering the Joined state, the WTP begins timing an interval equal to NeighborDeadInterval. Expiration of the timer will result in the transmission of the Echo Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 加入。进入连接状态后，WTP开始计时一个等于NeighborDeInterval的间隔。计时器过期将导致发送回显请求。

contents.text: This message is never received, or sent, when the security type used between the WTP and the AC is certificated-based.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP和AC之间使用的安全类型基于证书时，不会接收或发送此消息。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.4.1. Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4.1. 会话ID

contents.text: The Session ID message element is defined in Section 6.1.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素在第6.1.7节中定义。

contents.text: 6.4.2. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4.2. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element is defined in Section 6.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.9节定义了PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: 6.5. Echo Request
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5. 回显请求

contents.text: The Echo Request message is a keepalive mechanism for the LWAPP control message.
contents.zh-CHS: 回显请求消息是LWAPP控制消息的保留机制。

contents.text: Echo Requests are sent periodically by a WTP in the Run state (see Figure 2) to determine the state of the connection between the WTP and the AC. The Echo Request is sent by the WTP when the Heartbeat timer expires, and it MUST start its NeighborDeadInterval timer.
contents.zh-CHS: 回送请求由处于运行状态（见图2）的WTP定期发送，以确定WTP和AC之间连接的状态。当心跳计时器过期时，回送请求由WTP发送，并且它必须启动其相邻的间隔计时器。

contents.text: The Echo Request carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 回显请求不包含任何消息元素。

contents.text: When an AC receives an Echo Request, it responds with an Echo Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到回音请求时，它会以回音响应进行响应。

contents.text: 6.6. Echo Response
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6. 回声响应

contents.text: The Echo Response acknowledges the Echo Request, and is only accepted while in the Run state (see Figure 2).
contents.zh-CHS: Echo响应确认Echo请求，并且仅在处于运行状态时被接受（参见图2）。

contents.text: Echo Responses are sent by an AC after receiving an Echo Request. After transmitting the Echo Response, the AC should reset its Heartbeat timer to expire in the value configured for EchoInterval. If another Echo request is not received by the AC when the timer expires, the AC SHOULD consider the WTP to no longer be reachable.
contents.zh-CHS: 回音响应由AC在接收回音请求后发送。在发送回音响应后，AC应将其心跳计时器重置为在为EchoInterval配置的值内过期。如果在定时器到期时AC没有接收到另一个回声请求，则AC应该考虑WTP不再可到达。

contents.text: The Echo Response carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 回显响应不包含任何消息元素。

contents.text: When a WTP receives an Echo Response it stops the NeighborDeadInterval timer, and starts the Heartbeat timer to EchoInterval.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP接收到回音响应时，它会停止NeighborDedinterval计时器，并启动心跳计时器至EchoInterval。

contents.text: If the NeighborDeadInterval timer expires prior to receiving an Echo Response, the WTP enters the Idle state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在接收回显响应之前，NeighborDedinterval计时器过期，则WTP进入空闲状态。

contents.text: 6.7. Key Update Request
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7. 密钥更新请求

contents.text: The Key Update Request is used by the WTP to initiate the rekeying phase. This message is sent by a WTP when in the Run state and MUST include a new unique Session Identifier. This message MUST also include a unique nonce in the XNonce message element, which is used to protect against replay attacks (see Section 10).
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用密钥更新请求来启动密钥更新阶段。此消息在处于运行状态时由WTP发送，并且必须包含新的唯一会话标识符。此消息还必须在XNonce消息元素中包含一个唯一的nonce，用于防止重播攻击（请参阅第10节）。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.7.1. Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7.1. 会话ID

contents.text: The Session ID message element is defined in Section 6.1.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素在第6.1.7节中定义。

contents.text: 6.7.2. XNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7.2. XNonce

contents.text: The XNonce message element is defined in Section 6.1.9.
contents.zh-CHS: XNonce消息元素在第6.1.9节中定义。

contents.text: 6.8. Key Update Response
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8. 密钥更新响应

contents.text: The Key Update Response is sent by the AC in response to the request message, and includes an encrypted ANonce, which is used to derive new session keys. This message MUST include a Session Identifier message element, whose value MUST be identical to the one found in the Key Update Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥更新响应由AC发送以响应请求消息，并包括用于派生新会话密钥的加密ANonce。此消息必须包含会话标识符消息元素，其值必须与密钥更新请求中的值相同。

contents.text: The AC MUST include a PSK-MIC message element, which provides message integrity over the whole message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC必须包括一个PSK-MIC消息元素，该元素在整个消息中提供消息完整性。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.8.1. Session ID
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.1. 会话ID

contents.text: The Session ID message element is defined in Section 6.1.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素在第6.1.7节中定义。

contents.text: 6.8.2. ANonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2. ANonce

contents.text: The ANonce message element is defined in Section 6.2.8.
contents.zh-CHS: ANonce消息元素在第6.2.8节中定义。

contents.text: 6.8.3. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.3. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element is defined in Section 6.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.9节定义了PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: 6.9. Key Update ACK
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9. 密钥更新确认

contents.text: The Key Update ACK is sent by the WTP and includes an encrypted version of the WTP's nonce, which is used in the key derivation process. The session keys derived are then used as new LWAPP control message encryption keys (see Section 10).
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥更新ACK由WTP发送，并包括WTP的nonce的加密版本，该nonce用于密钥派生过程。然后将派生的会话密钥用作新的LWAPP控制消息加密密钥（参见第10节）。

contents.text: The WTP MUST include a PSK-MIC message element, which provides message integrity over the whole message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP必须包括一个PSK-MIC消息元素，该元素在整个消息中提供消息完整性。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.9.1. WNonce
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.1. WNonce

contents.text: The WNonce message element is defined in Section 6.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: WNonce消息元素在第6.3.2节中定义。

contents.text: 6.9.2. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element is defined in Section 6.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.9节定义了PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: 6.10. Key Update Confirm
contents.zh-CHS: 6.10. 密钥更新确认

contents.text: The Key Update Confirm closes the rekeying loop, and allows the WTP to recognize that the AC has received and processed the Key Update messages. At this point, the WTP updates its session key in its crypto engine, and the associated Initialization Vector, ensuring that all future LWAPP control frames are encrypted with the newly derived encryption key.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥更新确认关闭密钥更新循环，并允许WTP识别AC已接收并处理密钥更新消息。此时，WTP更新其加密引擎中的会话密钥以及相关的初始化向量，确保所有未来LWAPP控制帧都使用新派生的加密密钥加密。

contents.text: The WTP MUST include a PSK-MIC message element, which provides message integrity over the whole message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP必须包括一个PSK-MIC消息元素，该元素在整个消息中提供消息完整性。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.10.1. PSK-MIC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.10.1. PSK-MIC

contents.text: The PSK-MIC message element is defined in Section 6.2.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.9节定义了PSK-MIC消息元素。

contents.text: 6.11. Key Update Trigger
contents.zh-CHS: 6.11. 密钥更新触发器

contents.text: The Key Update Trigger is used by the AC to request that a Key Update Request be initiated by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用密钥更新触发器请求WTP启动密钥更新请求。

contents.text: Key Update Triggers are sent by an AC in the Run state to inform the WTP to initiate a Key Update Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在运行状态下发送密钥更新触发器，通知WTP启动密钥更新请求消息。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Key Update Trigger, it generates a Key Update Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到密钥更新触发器时，它生成密钥更新请求。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 6.11.1. Session ID
The Session ID message element is defined in Section 6.1.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话ID消息元素在第6.1.7节中定义。

contents.text: 7. WTP Configuration Management
contents.zh-CHS: 7. WTP配置管理

contents.text: The Wireless Termination Point Configuration messages are used to exchange configuration between the AC and the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线终端点配置消息用于在AC和WTP之间交换配置。

contents.text: 7.1. Configuration Consistency
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 配置一致性

contents.text: The LWAPP protocol provides flexibility in how WTP configuration is managed. To put it simply, a WTP has one of two options:
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP协议在如何管理WTP配置方面提供了灵活性。简言之，WTP有两种选择之一：

contents.text: 1. The WTP retains no configuration and simply abides by the configuration provided by the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. WTP不保留任何配置，仅遵守AC提供的配置。

contents.text: 2. The WTP retains the configuration of parameters provided by the AC that are non-default values.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. WTP保留AC提供的非默认值参数配置。

contents.text: If the WTP opts to save configuration locally, the LWAPP protocol state machine defines the "Configure" state, which is used during the initial binding WTP-AC phase, which allows for configuration exchange. During this period, the WTP sends its current configuration overrides to the AC via the Configure Request message. A configuration override is a parameter that is non-default. One example is that in the LWAPP protocol, the default antenna configuration is an internal-omni antenna. However, a WTP that either has no internal antennas, or has been explicitely configured by the AC to use external antennas would send its antenna configuration during the configure phase, allowing the AC to become aware of the WTP's current configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果WTP选择在本地保存配置，LWAPP协议状态机将定义“配置”状态，该状态在初始绑定WTP-AC阶段使用，允许进行配置交换。在此期间，WTP通过配置请求消息向AC发送其当前配置覆盖。配置替代是一个非默认参数。一个例子是，在LWAPP协议中，默认天线配置是内部全向天线。然而，没有内部天线或已被AC明确配置为使用外部天线的WTP将在配置阶段发送其天线配置，从而允许AC意识到WTP的当前配置。

contents.text: Once the WTP has provided its configuration to the AC, the AC sends down its own configuration. This allows the WTP to inherit the configuration and policies on the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦WTP向AC提供了其配置，AC将发送其自己的配置。这允许WTP继承AC上的配置和策略。

contents.text: An LWAPP AC maintains a copy of each active WTP's configuration. There is no need for versioning or other means to identify configuration changes. If a WTP becomes inactive, the AC MAY delete the configuration associated with it. If a WTP were to fail, and connect to a new AC, it would provide its overridden configuration parameters, allowing the new AC to be aware of the WTP's configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP AC维护每个活动WTP配置的副本。不需要版本控制或其他方法来识别配置更改。如果WTP变为非活动状态，AC可删除与其关联的配置。如果WTP发生故障并连接到新AC，它将提供其覆盖的配置参数，使新AC能够了解WTP的配置。

contents.text: As a consequence, this model allows for resiliency, whereby in light of an AC failure, another AC could provide service to the WTP. In this scenario, the new AC would be automatically updated on any possible WTP configuration changes -- eliminating the need for Inter-AC communication or the need for all ACs to be aware of the configuration of all WTPs in the network.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，该模型考虑了弹性，因此，根据AC故障，另一个AC可以向WTP提供服务。在这种情况下，新的AC将在任何可能的WTP配置更改时自动更新——消除AC间通信的需要或所有AC都需要知道网络中所有WTP的配置。

contents.text: Once the LWAPP protocol enters the Run state, the WTPs begin to provide service. However, it is quite common for administrators to require that configuration changes be made while the network is operational. Therefore, the Configuration Update Request is sent by the AC to the WTP in order to make these changes at run-time.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦LWAPP协议进入运行状态，WTP开始提供服务。但是，管理员通常要求在网络运行时更改配置。因此，配置更新请求由AC发送到WTP，以便在运行时进行这些更改。

contents.text: 7.2. Configure Request
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 配置请求

contents.text: The Configure Request message is sent by a WTP to send its current configuration to its AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置请求消息由WTP发送，以将其当前配置发送到其AC。

contents.text: Configure Requests are sent by a WTP after receiving a Join Response, while in the Configure state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在配置状态下，WTP在收到加入响应后发送配置请求。

contents.text: The Configure Request carries binding-specific message elements. Refer to the appropriate binding for the definition of this structure.
contents.zh-CHS: Configure请求携带绑定特定的消息元素。有关此结构的定义，请参阅相应的绑定。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Configure Request, it will act upon the content of the packet and respond to the WTP with a Configure Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到配置请求时，它将根据数据包的内容进行操作，并用配置响应响应WTP。

contents.text: The Configure Request includes multiple Administrative State message elements. There is one such message element for the WTP, and then one per radio in the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置请求包括多个管理状态消息元素。WTP有一个这样的消息元素，然后在WTP中每个无线电有一个。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 7.2.1. Administrative State
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.1. 行政国家

contents.text: The Administrative Event message element is used to communicate the state of a particular radio. The value contains the following fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 管理事件消息元素用于传达特定无线电的状态。该值包含以下字段。

contents.text: Type: 27 for Administrative State
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：行政州为27

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure. The Radio ID field may also include the value of 0xff, which is used to identify the WTP itself. Therefore, if an AC wishes to change the administrative state of a WTP, it would include 0xff in the Radio ID field.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。无线电ID字段还可以包括0xff的值，该值用于标识WTP本身。因此，如果AC希望更改WTP的管理状态，它将在无线电ID字段中包括0xff。

contents.text: Admin State: An 8-bit value representing the administrative state of the radio. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 管理状态：表示无线电管理状态的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - Enabled
contents.zh-CHS: 1-启用

contents.text: 2 - Disabled
contents.zh-CHS: 2-残疾人士

contents.text: 7.2.2. AC Name
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.2. AC名称

contents.text: The AC Name message element is defined in Section 5.2.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 第5.2.3节定义了AC名称信息元素。

contents.text: 7.2.3. AC Name with Index
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.3. 带索引的AC名称

contents.text: The AC Name with Index message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to configure preferred ACs. The number of instances where this message element would be present is equal to the number of ACs configured on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC向WTP发送带有索引消息元素的AC名称，以配置首选AC。此消息元素将出现的实例数等于WTP上配置的ACs数。

contents.text: Type: 90 for AC Name with Index
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：带索引的AC名称为90

contents.text: Length: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：5

contents.text: Index: The index of the preferred server (e.g., 1=primary, 2=secondary).
contents.zh-CHS: 索引：首选服务器的索引（例如，1=主服务器，2=辅助服务器）。

contents.text: AC Name: A variable-length ASCII string containing the AC's name.
contents.zh-CHS: AC名称：包含AC名称的可变长度ASCII字符串。

contents.text: 7.2.4. WTP Board Data
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.4. WTP板数据

contents.text: The WTP Board Data message element is sent by the WTP to the AC and contains information about the hardware present.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP板数据消息元素由WTP发送至AC，并包含有关现有硬件的信息。

contents.text: Type: 50 for WTP Board Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：WTP板数据为50

contents.text: Length: 26
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：26

contents.text: Card ID: A hardware identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 卡ID：硬件标识符。

contents.text: Card Revision: 4-byte Revision of the card.
contents.zh-CHS: 卡版本：卡的4字节版本。

contents.text: WTP Model: 8-byte WTP Model Number.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP型号：8字节WTP型号。

contents.text: WTP Serial Number: 24-byte WTP Serial Number.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP序列号：24字节WTP序列号。

contents.text: Reserved: A 4-byte reserved field that MUST be set to zero (0).
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零（0）的4字节保留字段。

contents.text: Ethernet MAC Address: MAC address of the WTP's Ethernet interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 以太网MAC地址：WTP以太网接口的MAC地址。

contents.text: 7.2.5. Statistics Timer
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.5. 统计计时器

contents.text: The Statistics Timer message element value is used by the AC to inform the WTP of the frequency that it expects to receive updated statistics.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用统计定时器消息元素值通知WTP其预期接收更新统计信息的频率。

contents.text: Type: 37 for Statistics Timer
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：37用于统计计时器

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Statistics Timer: A 16-bit unsigned integer indicating the time, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 统计计时器：表示时间的16位无符号整数，以秒为单位。

contents.text: 7.2.6. WTP Static IP Address Information
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.6. WTP静态IP地址信息

contents.text: The WTP Static IP Address Information message element is used by an AC to configure or clear a previously configured static IP address on a WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用WTP静态IP地址信息消息元素来配置或清除先前在WTP上配置的静态IP地址。

contents.text: Type: 82 for WTP Static IP Address Information
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：82用于WTP静态IP地址信息

contents.text: Length: 13
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：13

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address to assign to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：要分配给WTP的IP地址。

contents.text: Netmask: The IP Netmask.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络掩码：IP网络掩码。

contents.text: Gateway: The IP address of the gateway.
contents.zh-CHS: 网关：网关的IP地址。

contents.text: Netmask: The IP Netmask.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络掩码：IP网络掩码。

contents.text: Static: An 8-bit Boolean stating whether or not the WTP should use a static IP address. A value of zero disables the static IP address, while a value of one enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 静态：一个8位布尔值，说明WTP是否应使用静态IP地址。值为零将禁用静态IP地址，而值为1将启用静态IP地址。

contents.text: 7.2.7. WTP Reboot Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2.7. WTP重新启动统计信息

contents.text: The WTP Reboot Statistics message element is sent by the WTP to the AC to communicate information about reasons why reboots have occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP向AC发送WTP Reboot Statistics消息元素，以传达有关重新启动原因的信息。

contents.text: Type: 67 for WTP Reboot Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：67用于WTP重新启动统计信息

contents.text: Length: 7
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：7

contents.text: Crash Count: The number of reboots that have occurred due to a WTP crash.
contents.zh-CHS: 崩溃计数：由于WTP崩溃而发生的重新启动次数。

contents.text: LWAPP Initiated Count: The number of reboots that have occurred at the request of some LWAPP message, such as a change in configuration that required a reboot or an explicit LWAPP reset request.
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP Initiated Count：请求某些LWAPP消息时发生的重新启动次数，例如需要重新启动的配置更改或明确的LWAPP重置请求。

contents.text: Link Failure Count: The number of times that an LWAPP connection with an AC has failed.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路失败计数：与AC的LWAPP连接失败的次数。

contents.text: Failure Type: The last WTP failure. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 故障类型：最后一次WTP故障。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Link Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 0-链路故障

contents.text: 1 - LWAPP Initiated
contents.zh-CHS: 1-LWAPP已启动

contents.text: 2 - WTP Crash
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WTP碰撞

contents.text: 7.3. Configure Response
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 配置响应

contents.text: The Configure Response message is sent by an AC and provides an opportunity for the AC to override a WTP's requested configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置响应消息由AC发送，并为AC提供覆盖WTP请求的配置的机会。

contents.text: Configure Responses are sent by an AC after receiving a Configure Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置响应在收到配置请求后由AC发送。

contents.text: The Configure Response carries binding-specific message elements. Refer to the appropriate binding for the definition of this structure.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置响应携带绑定特定的消息元素。有关此结构的定义，请参阅相应的绑定。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Configure Response, it acts upon the content of the packet, as appropriate. If the Configure Response message includes a Change State Event message element that causes a change in the operational state of one of the Radios, the WTP will transmit a Change State Event to the AC as an acknowledgement of the change in state.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到配置响应时，它会根据需要对数据包的内容进行操作。如果配置响应消息包括导致其中一个无线电的工作状态发生变化的变化状态事件消息元素，则WTP将向AC发送变化状态事件，作为状态变化的确认。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that MUST be included in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须包含的消息元素。

contents.text: 7.3.1. Decryption Error Report Period
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.1. 解密错误报告期

contents.text: The Decryption Error Report Period message element value is used by the AC to inform the WTP of how frequently it should send decryption error report messages.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用解密错误报告周期消息元素值通知WTP其应发送解密错误报告消息的频率。

contents.text: Type: 38 for Decryption Error Report Period
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：38用于解密错误报告期

contents.text: Length: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：3

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier: typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符：通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Report Interval: A 16-bit, unsigned integer indicating the time, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 报告间隔：16位无符号整数，表示时间，以秒为单位。

contents.text: 7.3.2. Change State Event
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.2. 更改状态事件

contents.text: The WTP Radio Information message element is used to communicate the operational state of a radio. The value contains two fields, as shown.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP无线电信息消息元素用于传达无线电的工作状态。该值包含两个字段，如图所示。

contents.text: Type: 26 for Change State Event
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：26用于更改状态事件

contents.text: Length: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：3

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier: typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符：通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: State: An 8-bit Boolean value representing the state of the radio. A value of one disables the radio, while a value of two enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：表示收音机状态的8位布尔值。值为1将禁用收音机，而值为2将启用收音机。

contents.text: Cause: In the event of a radio being inoperable, the Cause field would contain the reason the radio is out of service. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 原因：如果收音机不可操作，原因字段将包含收音机停止工作的原因。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Normal
contents.zh-CHS: 0-正常

contents.text: 1 - Radio Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 1-无线电故障

contents.text: 2 - Software Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 2-软件故障

contents.text: 7.3.3. LWAPP Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.3. LWAPP定时器

contents.text: The LWAPP Timers message element is used by an AC to configure LWAPP timers on a WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用LWAPP定时器消息元素在WTP上配置LWAPP定时器。

contents.text: Type: 68 for LWAPP Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：68适用于LWAPP定时器

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Discovery: The number of seconds between LWAPP Discovery packets when the WTP is in the discovery mode.
contents.zh-CHS: 发现：WTP处于发现模式时LWAPP发现数据包之间的秒数。

contents.text: Echo Request: The number of seconds between WTP Echo Request LWAPP messages.
contents.zh-CHS: Echo Request：WTP Echo Request LWAPP消息之间的秒数。

contents.text: 7.3.4. AC IPv4 List
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.4. AC IPv4列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is defined in Section 6.2.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.6节定义了AC列表消息元素。

contents.text: 7.3.5. AC IPv6 List
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.5. AC IPv6列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is defined in Section 6.2.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.7节定义了AC列表消息元素。

contents.text: 7.3.6. WTP Fallback
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.6. WTP回退

contents.text: The WTP Fallback message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to enable or disable automatic LWAPP fallback in the event that a WTP detects its preferred AC, and is not currently connected to it.
contents.zh-CHS: AC向WTP发送WTP回退消息元素，以在WTP检测到其首选AC且当前未连接到其时启用或禁用自动LWAPP回退。

contents.text: Type: 91 for WTP Fallback
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：91用于WTP回退

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Mode: The 8-bit Boolean value indicates the status of automatic LWAPP fallback on the WTP. A value of zero disables the fallback feature, while a value of one enables it. When enabled, if the WTP detects that its primary AC is available, and it is not connected to it, it SHOULD automatically disconnect from its current AC and reconnect to its primary. If disabled, the WTP will only reconnect to its primary through manual intervention (e.g., through the Reset Request command).
contents.zh-CHS: 模式：8位布尔值表示WTP上自动LWAPP回退的状态。值为零将禁用回退功能，而值为1将启用该功能。启用时，如果WTP检测到其主AC可用，且未连接，则应自动断开其当前AC并重新连接到其主AC。如果禁用，WTP将仅通过手动干预（例如，通过重置请求命令）重新连接到其主设备。

contents.text: 7.3.7. Idle Timeout
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3.7. 空闲超时

contents.text: The Idle Timeout message element is sent by the AC to the WTP to provide it with the idle timeout that it should enforce on its active mobile station entries.
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲超时消息元素由AC发送到WTP，以向其提供空闲超时，该空闲超时应强制其活动移动站条目。

contents.text: Type: 97 for Idle Timeout
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：97表示空闲超时

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Timeout: The current idle timeout to be enforced by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 超时：WTP要强制执行的当前空闲超时。

contents.text: 7.4. Configuration Update Request
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4. 配置更新请求

contents.text: Configure Update Requests are sent by the AC to provision the WTP while in the Run state. This is used to modify the configuration of the WTP while it is operational.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新请求由AC发送，以在处于运行状态时配置WTP。这用于在WTP运行时修改其配置。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Configuration Update Request it will respond with a Configuration Update Response, with the appropriate Result Code.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到配置更新请求时，它将使用配置更新响应以及相应的结果代码进行响应。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements introduced by this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作引入的消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.1. WTP Name
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.1. WTP名称

contents.text: The WTP Name message element is defined in Section 6.1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP名称消息元素在第6.1.3节中定义。

contents.text: 7.4.2. Change State Event
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.2. 更改状态事件

contents.text: The Change State Event message element is defined in Section 7.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7.3.2节定义了变更状态事件消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.3. Administrative State
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.3. 行政国家

contents.text: The Administrative State message element is defined in Section 7.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7.2.1节定义了管理状态消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.4. Statistics Timer
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.4. 统计计时器

contents.text: The Statistics Timer message element is defined in Section 7.2.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7.2.5节定义了统计计时器消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.5. Location Data
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.5. 位置数据

contents.text: The Location Data message element is defined in Section 6.1.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.1.4节定义了位置数据消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.6. Decryption Error Report Period
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.6. 解密错误报告期

contents.text: The Decryption Error Report Period message element is defined in Section 7.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 解密错误报告周期消息元素在第7.3.1节中定义。

contents.text: 7.4.7. AC IPv4 List
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.7. AC IPv4列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is defined in Section 6.2.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.6节定义了AC列表消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.8. AC IPv6 List
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.8. AC IPv6列表

contents.text: The AC List message element is defined in Section 6.2.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.7节定义了AC列表消息元素。

contents.text: 7.4.9. Add Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.9. 添加黑名单条目

contents.text: The Add Blacklist Entry message element is used by an AC to add a blacklist entry on a WTP, ensuring that the WTP no longer provides any service to the MAC addresses provided in the message. The MAC addresses provided in this message element are not expected to be saved in non-volative memory on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用添加黑名单条目消息元素在WTP上添加黑名单条目，确保WTP不再向消息中提供的MAC地址提供任何服务。此消息元素中提供的MAC地址预计不会保存在WTP上的非活动内存中。

contents.text: Type: 65 for Add Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：65用于添加黑名单条目

contents.text: Length:   >= 7
Num of Entries: The number of MAC addresses in the array.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中MAC地址的数量。

contents.text: MAC Address: An array of MAC addresses to add to the blacklist entry.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：要添加到黑名单条目的MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 7.4.10. Delete Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.10. 删除黑名单条目

contents.text: The Delete Blacklist Entry message element is used by an AC to delete a previously added blacklist entry on a WTP, ensuring that the WTP provides service to the MAC addresses provided in the message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用删除黑名单条目消息元素删除WTP上先前添加的黑名单条目，确保WTP向消息中提供的MAC地址提供服务。

contents.text: Type: 66 for Delete Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：66用于删除黑名单条目

contents.text: Length:   >= 7
Num of Entries: The number of MAC addresses in the array.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中MAC地址的数量。

contents.text: MAC Address: An array of MAC addresses to delete from the blacklist entry.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：从黑名单条目中删除的MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 7.4.11. Add Static Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.11. 添加静态黑名单条目

contents.text: The Add Static Blacklist Entry message element is used by an AC to add a permanent Blacklist Entry on a WTP, ensuring that the WTP no longer provides any service to the MAC addresses provided in the message. The MAC addresses provided in this message element are expected to be saved in non-volative memory on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用添加静态黑名单条目消息元素在WTP上添加永久黑名单条目，确保WTP不再向消息中提供的MAC地址提供任何服务。此消息元素中提供的MAC地址应保存在WTP上的非活动内存中。

contents.text: Type: 70 for Delete Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：70用于删除黑名单条目

contents.text: Length:   >= 7
Num of Entries: The number of MAC addresses in the array.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中MAC地址的数量。

contents.text: MAC Address: An array of MAC addresses to add to the permanent blacklist entry.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：要添加到永久黑名单条目的MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 7.4.12. Delete Static Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.12. 删除静态黑名单条目

contents.text: The Delete Static Blacklist Entry message element is used by an AC to delete a previously added static blacklist entry on a WTP, ensuring that the WTP provides service to the MAC addresses provided in the message.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用删除静态黑名单条目消息元素删除WTP上先前添加的静态黑名单条目，确保WTP向消息中提供的MAC地址提供服务。

contents.text: Type: 71 for Delete Blacklist Entry
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：71用于删除黑名单条目

contents.text: Length:   >= 7
Num of Entries: The number of MAC addresses in the array.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：数组中MAC地址的数量。

contents.text: MAC Address: An array of MAC addresses to delete from the static blacklist entry.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：从静态黑名单条目中删除的MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 7.4.13. LWAPP Timers
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.13. LWAPP定时器

contents.text: The LWAPP Timers message element is defined in Section 7.3.3.
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP定时器消息元素在第7.3.3节中定义。

contents.text: 7.4.14. AC Name with Index
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.14. 带索引的AC名称

contents.text: The AC Name with Index message element is defined in Section 7.2.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7.2.3节定义了带有索引消息元素的AC名称。

contents.text: 7.4.15. WTP Fallback
contents.zh-CHS: 7.4.15. WTP回退

contents.text: The WTP Fallback message element is defined in Section 7.3.6.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP回退消息元素在第7.3.6节中定义。

contents.text: 7.4.16. Idle Timeout
The Idle Timeout message element is defined in Section 7.3.7.
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲超时消息元素在第7.3.7节中定义。

contents.text: 7.5. Configuration Update Response
contents.zh-CHS: 7.5. 配置更新响应

contents.text: The Configuration Update Response is the acknowledgement message for the Configuration Update Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 配置更新响应是配置更新请求的确认消息。

contents.text: Configuration Update Responses are sent by a WTP after receiving a Configuration Update Request.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在收到配置更新请求后发送配置更新响应。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Configure Update Response, the result code indicates if the WTP successfully accepted the configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到配置更新响应时，结果代码指示WTP是否成功接受配置。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that must be present in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须存在的消息元素。

contents.text: 7.5.1. Result Code
contents.zh-CHS: 7.5.1. 结果代码

contents.text: The Result Code message element is defined in Section 6.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.1节定义了结果代码消息元素。

contents.text: 7.6. Change State Event Request
contents.zh-CHS: 7.6. 更改状态事件请求

contents.text: The Change State Event is used by the WTP to inform the AC of a change in the operational state.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用变更状态事件通知AC运行状态的变更。

contents.text: The Change State Event message is sent by the WTP when it receives a Configuration Response that includes a Change State Event message element. It is also sent in the event that the WTP detects an operational failure with a radio. The Change State Event may be sent in either the Configure or Run state (see Figure 2).
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP接收到包含变更状态事件消息元素的配置响应时，变更状态事件消息由WTP发送。当WTP检测到无线电操作故障时，也会发送该信号。ChangeState事件可以在Configure或Run状态下发送（参见图2）。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Change State Event it will respond with a Change State Event Response and make any necessary modifications to internal WTP data structures.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到变更状态事件时，它将使用变更状态事件响应进行响应，并对内部WTP数据结构进行任何必要的修改。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that must be present in this LWAPP operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了此LWAPP操作中必须存在的消息元素。

contents.text: 7.6.1. Change State Event
contents.zh-CHS: 7.6.1. 更改状态事件

contents.text: The Change State Event message element is defined in Section 7.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 第7.3.2节定义了变更状态事件消息元素。

contents.text: 7.7. Change State Event Response
contents.zh-CHS: 7.7. 更改状态事件响应

contents.text: The Change State Event Response acknowledges the Change State Event.
contents.zh-CHS: 变更状态事件响应确认变更状态事件。

contents.text: Change State Event Responses are sent by a WTP after receiving a Change State Event.
contents.zh-CHS: 变更状态事件响应由WTP在收到变更状态事件后发送。

contents.text: The Change State Event Response carries no message elements. Its purpose is to acknowledge the receipt of the Change State Event.
contents.zh-CHS: 更改状态事件响应不包含任何消息元素。其目的是确认收到变更状态事件。

contents.text: The WTP does not need to perform any special processing of the Change State Event Response message.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP不需要对变更状态事件响应消息执行任何特殊处理。

contents.text: 7.8. Clear Config Indication
contents.zh-CHS: 7.8. 清除配置指示

contents.text: The Clear Config Indication is used to reset a WTP's configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 清除配置指示用于重置WTP的配置。

contents.text: The Clear Config Indication is sent by an AC to request that a WTP reset its configuration to manufacturing defaults. The Clear Config Indication message is sent while in the Run LWAPP state.
contents.zh-CHS: AC发送清除配置指示，请求WTP将其配置重置为制造默认值。在运行LWAPP状态下发送清除配置指示消息。

contents.text: The Reset Request carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置请求不包含任何消息元素。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Clear Config Indication, it will reset its configuration to manufacturing defaults.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到明确的配置指示时，它会将其配置重置为制造默认值。

contents.text: 8. Device Management Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 设备管理操作

contents.text: This section defines LWAPP operations responsible for debugging, gathering statistics, logging, and firmware management.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义负责调试、收集统计信息、日志记录和固件管理的LWAPP操作。

contents.text: 8.1. Image Data Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 图像数据请求

contents.text: The Image Data Request is used to update firmware on the WTP. This message and its companion response are used by the AC to ensure that the image being run on each WTP is appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 映像数据请求用于更新WTP上的固件。AC使用此消息及其伴随响应来确保在每个WTP上运行的映像是适当的。

contents.text: Image Data Requests are exchanged between the WTP and the AC to download a new program image to a WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据请求在WTP和AC之间交换，以将新的节目图像下载到WTP。

contents.text: When a WTP or AC receives an Image Data Request, it will respond with
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP或AC收到图像数据请求时，它将以

contents.text: an Image Data Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据响应。

contents.text: The format of the Image Data and Image Download message elements are described in the following subsections.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据和图像下载消息元素的格式在以下小节中描述。

contents.text: 8.1.1. Image Download
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.1. 图像下载

contents.text: The Image Download message element is sent by the WTP to the AC and contains the image filename. The value is a variable-length byte string. The string is NOT zero terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像下载消息元素由WTP发送到AC，并包含图像文件名。该值是长度可变的字节字符串。字符串不是以零结尾的。

contents.text: 8.1.2. Image Data
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.2. 图像数据

contents.text: The Image Data message element is present when sent by the AC and contains the following fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据消息元素在AC发送时存在，并包含以下字段。

contents.text: Type: 33 for Image Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：33用于图像数据

contents.text: Length:   >= 5
Opcode: An 8-bit value representing the transfer opcode. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码：表示传输操作码的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 3 - Image Data is included.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-包括图像数据。

contents.text: 5 - An error occurred. Transfer is aborted.
contents.zh-CHS: 5-发生错误。传输被中止。

contents.text: Checksum: A 16-bit value containing a checksum of the Image Data that follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 校验和：一个16位的值，包含后面图像数据的校验和。

contents.text: Image Data: The Image Data field contains 1024 characters, unless the payload being sent is the last one (end of file).
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据：图像数据字段包含1024个字符，除非发送的负载是最后一个（文件末尾）。

contents.text: 8.2. Image Data Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 图像数据响应

contents.text: The Image Data Response acknowledges the Image Data Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据响应确认图像数据请求。

contents.text: An Image Data Responses is sent in response to an Image Data Request. Its purpose is to acknowledge the receipt of the Image Data Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应于图像数据请求发送图像数据响应。其目的是确认图像数据请求包的接收。

contents.text: The Image Data Response carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 图像数据响应不携带任何消息元素。

contents.text: No action is necessary on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到后无需采取任何行动。

contents.text: 8.3. Reset Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.3. 重置请求

contents.text: The Reset Request is used to cause a WTP to reboot.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置请求用于导致WTP重新启动。

contents.text: Reset Requests are sent by an AC to cause a WTP to reinitialize its operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置请求由AC发送，以使WTP重新初始化其操作。

contents.text: The Reset Request carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置请求不包含任何消息元素。

contents.text: When a WTP receives a Reset Request it will respond with a Reset Response and then reinitialize itself.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP收到重置请求时，它将以重置响应进行响应，然后重新初始化自身。

contents.text: 8.4. Reset Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.4. 重置响应

contents.text: The Reset Response acknowledges the Reset Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置响应确认重置请求。

contents.text: Reset Responses are sent by a WTP after receiving a Reset Request.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在收到重置请求后发送重置响应。

contents.text: The Reset Response carries no message elements. Its purpose is to acknowledge the receipt of the Reset Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 重置响应不包含任何消息元素。其目的是确认收到重置请求。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Reset Response, it is notified that the WTP will now reinitialize its operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到重置响应时，通知WTP现在将重新初始化其操作。

contents.text: 8.5. WTP Event Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5. WTP事件请求

contents.text: The WTP Event Request is used by a WTP to send information to its AC. These types of events may be periodical, or some asynchronous event on the WTP. For instance, a WTP collects statistics and uses the WTP Event Request to transmit this information to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP事件请求由WTP用于向其AC发送信息。这些类型的事件可能是周期性的，也可能是WTP上的某些异步事件。例如，WTP收集统计信息并使用WTP事件请求将此信息传输给AC。

contents.text: When an AC receives a WTP Event Request, it will respond with a WTP Event Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到WTP事件请求时，它将响应WTP事件请求。

contents.text: The WTP Event Request message MUST contain one of the following message element described in the next subsections, or a message element that is defined for a specific technology.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP事件请求消息必须包含下一小节中描述的以下消息元素之一，或为特定技术定义的消息元素。

contents.text: 8.5.1. Decryption Error Report
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5.1. 解密错误报告

contents.text: The Decryption Error Report message element value is used by the WTP to inform the AC of decryption errors that have occurred since the last report.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用解密错误报告消息元素值通知AC自上次报告以来发生的解密错误。

contents.text: Type: 39 for Decryption Error Report
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：39用于解密错误报告

contents.text: Length:   >= 8
Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Num Of Entries: An 8-bit unsigned integer indicating the number of mobile MAC addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: 条目数：一个8位无符号整数，指示移动MAC地址的数量。

contents.text: Mobile MAC Address: An array of mobile station MAC addresses that have caused decryption errors.
contents.zh-CHS: 移动MAC地址：导致解密错误的移动站MAC地址数组。

contents.text: 8.5.2. Duplicate IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5.2. 重复的IPv4地址

contents.text: The Duplicate IPv4 Address message element is used by a WTP to inform an AC that it has detected another host using the same IP address it is currently using.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用重复IPv4地址消息元素通知AC，它已检测到另一台主机使用其当前使用的相同IP地址。

contents.text: Type: 77 for Duplicate IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：77表示重复的IPv4地址

contents.text: Length: 10
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：10

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address currently used by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：WTP当前使用的IP地址。

contents.text: MAC Address: The MAC address of the offending device.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：违规设备的MAC地址。

contents.text: 8.5.3. Duplicate IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 8.5.3. 重复的IPv6地址

contents.text: The Duplicate IPv6 Address message element is used by a WTP to inform an AC that it has detected another host using the same IP address it is currently using.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用复制IPv6地址消息元素通知AC，它已检测到另一台主机使用其当前使用的相同IP地址。

contents.text: Type: 77 for Duplicate IPv6 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：77表示重复的IPv6地址

contents.text: Length: 10
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：10

contents.text: IP Address: The IP address currently used by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IP地址：WTP当前使用的IP地址。

contents.text: MAC Address: The MAC address of the offending device.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：违规设备的MAC地址。

contents.text: 8.6. WTP Event Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.6. WTP事件响应

contents.text: The WTP Event Response acknowledges the WTP Event Request.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP事件响应确认WTP事件请求。

contents.text: WTP Event Responses are sent by an AC after receiving a WTP Event Request.
contents.zh-CHS: AC在收到WTP事件请求后发送WTP事件响应。

contents.text: The WTP Event Response carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP事件响应不包含任何消息元素。

contents.text: 8.7. Data Transfer Request
contents.zh-CHS: 8.7. 数据传输请求

contents.text: The Data Transfer Request is used to upload debug information from the WTP to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据传输请求用于将调试信息从WTP上载到AC。

contents.text: Data Transfer Requests are sent by the WTP to the AC when it determines that it has important information to send to the AC. For instance, if the WTP detects that its previous reboot was caused by a system crash, it would want to send the crash file to the AC. The remote debugger function in the WTP also uses the Data Transfer Request in order to send console output to the AC for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP确定有重要信息要发送给AC时，数据传输请求由WTP发送给AC。例如，如果WTP检测到其先前的重新启动是由系统崩溃引起的，它希望将崩溃文件发送到AC。WTP中的远程调试器功能还使用数据传输请求将控制台输出发送到AC以进行调试。

contents.text: When an AC receives a Data Transfer Request, it will respond with a Data Transfer Response. The AC may log the information received as it sees fit.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC收到数据传输请求时，它将以数据传输响应进行响应。AC可在其认为合适的情况下记录收到的信息。

contents.text: The Data Transfer Request message MUST contain ONE of the following message element described in the next subsection.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据传输请求消息必须包含下一小节中描述的以下消息元素之一。

contents.text: 8.7.1. Data Transfer Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 8.7.1. 数据传输模式

contents.text: The Data Transfer Mode message element is used by the AC to request information from the WTP for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用数据传输模式消息元素从WTP请求信息以进行调试。

contents.text: Type: 52 for Data Transfer Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：52用于数据传输模式

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Data Type: An 8-bit value describing the type of information being requested. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据类型：描述所请求信息类型的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - WTP Crash Data
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WTP碰撞数据

contents.text: 2 - WTP Memory Dump
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WTP内存转储

contents.text: 8.7.2. Data Transfer Data
contents.zh-CHS: 8.7.2. 数据传输数据

contents.text: The Data Transfer Data message element is used by the WTP to provide information to the AC for debugging purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用数据传输数据消息元素向AC提供信息，以便进行调试。

contents.text: Type: 53 for Data Transfer Data
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：53用于数据传输数据

contents.text: Length:   >= 3
Data Type: An 8-bit value describing the type of information being sent. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 数据类型：描述所发送信息类型的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - WTP Crash Data
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WTP碰撞数据

contents.text: 2 - WTP Memory Dump
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WTP内存转储

contents.text: Data Length: Length of data field.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据长度：数据字段的长度。

contents.text: Data: Debug information.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据：调试信息。

contents.text: 8.8. Data Transfer Response
contents.zh-CHS: 8.8. 数据传输响应

contents.text: The Data Transfer Response acknowledges the Data Transfer Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据传输响应确认数据传输请求。

contents.text: A Data Transfer Response is sent in response to a Data Transfer Request. Its purpose is to acknowledge the receipt of the Data Transfer Request packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送数据传输响应以响应数据传输请求。其目的是确认数据传输请求包的接收。

contents.text: The Data Transfer Response carries no message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据传输响应不携带任何消息元素。

contents.text: Upon receipt of a Data Transfer Response, the WTP transmits more information, if any is available.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦收到数据传输响应，WTP将传输更多信息（如果有）。

contents.text: 9. Mobile Session Management
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 移动会话管理

contents.text: Messages in this section are used by the AC to create, modify, or delete mobile station session state on the WTPs.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用本节中的消息在WTP上创建、修改或删除移动台会话状态。

contents.text: 9.1. Mobile Config Request
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. 移动配置请求

contents.text: The Mobile Config Request message is used to create, modify, or delete mobile session state on a WTP. The message is sent by the AC to the WTP, and may contain one or more message elements. The
contents.zh-CHS: 移动配置请求消息用于在WTP上创建、修改或删除移动会话状态。消息由AC发送到WTP，并且可能包含一个或多个消息元素。这个

contents.text: message elements for this LWAPP control message include information that is generally highly technology-specific. Therefore, please refer to the appropriate binding section or document for the definitions of the messages elements that may be used in this control message.
contents.zh-CHS: 此LWAPP控制消息的消息元素包括通常高度特定于技术的信息。因此，有关此控制消息中可能使用的消息元素的定义，请参阅相应的绑定部分或文档。

contents.text: This section defines the format of the Delete Mobile message element, since it does not contain any technology-specific information.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了Delete Mobile message元素的格式，因为它不包含任何特定于技术的信息。

contents.text: 9.1.1. Delete Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1.1. 删除手机

contents.text: The Delete Mobile message element is used by the AC to inform a WTP that it should no longer provide service to a particular mobile station. The WTP must terminate service immediately upon receiving this message element.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用删除移动消息元素来通知WTP它不应再向特定移动站提供服务。WTP必须在收到此消息元素后立即终止服务。

contents.text: The transmission of a Delete Mobile message element could occur for various reasons, including administrative reasons, as a result of the fact that the mobile has roamed to another WTP, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 删除移动消息元素的传输可能由于各种原因而发生，包括由于移动设备已经漫游到另一WTP等的事实而导致的管理原因。

contents.text: Once access has been terminated for a given station, any future packets received from the mobile must result in a deauthenticate message, as specified in [6].
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦给定站点的访问被终止，从移动设备接收到的任何未来数据包都必须产生一条反验证消息，如[6]中所述。

contents.text: Type: 30 for Delete Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：30用于删除手机

contents.text: Length: 7
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：7

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值

contents.text: MAC Address: The mobile station's MAC address
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：移动台的MAC地址

contents.text: 9.2. Mobile Config Response
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. 移动配置响应

contents.text: The Mobile Configuration Response is used to acknowledge a previously received Mobile Configuration Request, and includes a Result Code message element that indicates whether an error occurred on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 移动配置响应用于确认先前接收到的移动配置请求，并且包括指示WTP上是否发生错误的结果代码消息元素。

contents.text: This message requires no special processing and is only used to acknowledge the Mobile Configuration Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此消息不需要特殊处理，仅用于确认移动配置请求。

contents.text: The Data Transfer Request message MUST contain the message elements described in the next subsection.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据传输请求消息必须包含下一小节中描述的消息元素。

contents.text: 9.2.1. Result Code
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2.1. 结果代码

contents.text: The Result Code message element is defined in Section 6.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.2.1节定义了结果代码消息元素。

contents.text: 10. LWAPP Security
contents.zh-CHS: 10. LWAPP安全

contents.text: Note: This version only defines a certificate and a shared-secret-based mechanism to secure control LWAPP traffic exchanged between the WTP and the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：此版本仅定义了一个证书和一个基于共享秘密的机制，用于安全控制WTP和AC之间交换的LWAPP流量。

contents.text: 10.1. Securing WTP-AC Communications
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 保护WTP-AC通信

contents.text: While it is generally straightforward to produce network installations in which the communications medium between the WTP and AC is not accessible to the casual user (e.g., these LAN segments are isolated, and no RJ45 or other access ports exist between the WTP and the AC), this will not always be the case. Furthermore, a determined attacker may resort to various, more sophisticated monitoring and/or access techniques, thereby compromising the integrity of this connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然通常很容易产生WTP和AC之间的通信介质不可供临时用户访问的网络安装（例如，这些LAN段是隔离的，WTP和AC之间不存在RJ45或其他访问端口），但情况并非总是如此。此外，确定的攻击者可能求助于各种更复杂的监视和/或访问技术，从而损害此连接的完整性。

contents.text: In general, a certain level of threat on the local (wired) LAN is expected and accepted in most computing environments. That is, it is expected that in order to provide users with an acceptable level of service and maintain reasonable productivity levels, a certain amount of risk must be tolerated. It is generally believed that a certain perimeter is maintained around such LANs, that an attacker must have access to the building(s) in which such LANs exist, and that they must be able to "plug in" to the LAN in order to access the network.
contents.zh-CHS: 一般来说，在大多数计算环境中，本地（有线）LAN上都会出现一定程度的威胁。也就是说，为了向用户提供可接受的服务水平并保持合理的生产力水平，必须容忍一定的风险。一般认为，此类LAN周围有一定的周界，攻击者必须能够访问此类LAN所在的建筑物，并且必须能够“插入”LAN以访问网络。

contents.text: With these things in mind, we can begin to assess the general security requirements for AC-WTP communications. While an in-depth security analysis of threats and risks to these communications is beyond the scope of this document, some discussion of the motivation for various security-related design choices is useful. The assumptions driving the security design thus far include the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑到这些，我们可以开始评估AC-WTP通信的一般安全要求。虽然对这些通信的威胁和风险进行深入的安全分析超出了本文档的范围，但对各种安全相关设计选择的动机进行一些讨论是有用的。迄今为止，推动安全设计的假设包括：

contents.text: o WTP-AC communications take place over a wired connection that may be accessible to a sophisticated attacker.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP-AC通信通过复杂攻击者可以访问的有线连接进行。

contents.text: o access to this connection is not trivial for an outsider (i.e., someone who does not "belong" in the building) to access.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于外部人员（即，不“属于”大楼的人）来说，访问此连接并非微不足道。

contents.text: o if authentication and/or privacy of end-to-end traffic for which the WTP and AC are intermediaries is required, this may be provided via IPsec [14].
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果需要WTP和AC作为中介的端到端通信的身份验证和/或隐私，则可通过IPsec提供[14]。

contents.text: o privacy and authentication for at least some WTP-AC control traffic is required (e.g., Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) keys for user sessions, passed from the AC to the WTP).
contents.zh-CHS: o 至少需要一些WTP-AC控制流量的隐私和身份验证（例如，用户会话的有线等效隐私（WEP）密钥，从AC传递到WTP）。

contents.text: o the AC can be trusted to generate strong cryptographic keys.
contents.zh-CHS: o 可以信任AC生成强加密密钥。

contents.text: The AC-WTP traffic can be considered to consist of two types: data traffic (e.g., to or from an end user), and control traffic, which is strictly between the AC and WTP. Since data traffic may be secured using IPsec (or some other end-to-end security mechanism), we confine our solution to control traffic. The resulting security consists of two components: an authenticated key exchange and control traffic security encapsulation. The security encapsulation is accomplished using AES-CCM, described in [3]. This encapsulation provides for strong AES-based authentication and encryption [2]. The exchange of cryptographic keys used for CCM is described below.
contents.zh-CHS: AC-WTP流量可被视为由两种类型组成：数据流量（例如，到最终用户或来自最终用户）和控制流量，这两种流量严格介于AC和WTP之间。由于可以使用IPsec（或其他端到端安全机制）保护数据流量，因此我们的解决方案仅限于控制流量。由此产生的安全性由两个组件组成：经过身份验证的密钥交换和控制流量安全封装。安全封装使用AES-CCM完成，如[3]所述。这种封装提供了基于AES的强身份验证和加密[2]。用于CCM的加密密钥的交换如下所述。

contents.text: 10.2. LWAPP Frame Encryption
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. LWAPP帧加密

contents.text: While the LWAPP protocol uses AES-CCM to encrypt control traffic, it is important to note that not all control frames are encrypted. The LWAPP discovery and join phase are not encrypted. The Discovery messages are sent in the clear since there does not exist a security association between the WTP and the AC during the discovery phase. The join phase is an authenticated exchange used to negotiate symmetric session keys (see Section 10.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然LWAPP协议使用AES-CCM加密控制流量，但需要注意的是，并非所有控制帧都加密。LWAPP发现和加入阶段未加密。由于在发现阶段WTP和AC之间不存在安全关联，因此以清除方式发送发现消息。连接阶段是一个经过身份验证的交换，用于协商对称会话密钥（参见第10.3节）。

contents.text: Once the join phase has been successfully completed, the LWAPP state machine Figure 2 will move to the Configure state, at which time all LWAPP control frames are encrypted using AES-CCM.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦连接阶段成功完成，LWAPP状态机图2将移动到配置状态，此时所有LWAPP控制帧都使用AES-CCM加密。

contents.text: Encryption of a control message begins at the Message Element field: meaning the Msg Type, Seq Num, Msg Element Length, and Session ID fields are left intact (see Section 4.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 控制消息的加密从消息元素字段开始：这意味着消息类型、Seq Num、消息元素长度和会话ID字段保持不变（参见第4.2.1节）。

contents.text: The AES-CCM 12-byte authentication data is appended to the end of the message. The authentication data is calculated from the start of the LWAPP packet and includes the complete LWAPP control header (see Section 4.2.1).
contents.zh-CHS: AES-CCM 12字节认证数据附加到消息末尾。认证数据从LWAPP数据包开始计算，包括完整的LWAPP控制报头（见第4.2.1节）。

contents.text: The AES-CCM block cipher protocol requires an initialization vector. The LWAPP protocol requires that the WTP and the AC maintain two separate IVs, one for transmission and one for reception. The IV derived during the key exchange phase by both the WTP and the AC is used as the base for all encrypted packets with a new key.
contents.zh-CHS: AES-CCM分组密码协议需要初始化向量。LWAPP协议要求WTP和AC保持两个单独的IVs，一个用于传输，一个用于接收。WTP和AC在密钥交换阶段导出的IV用作具有新密钥的所有加密数据包的基础。

contents.text: 10.3. Authenticated Key Exchange
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3. 认证密钥交换

contents.text: This section describes the key management component of the LWAPP protocol. There are two modes supported by LWAPP: certificate and pre-shared key.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍LWAPP协议的密钥管理组件。LWAPP支持两种模式：证书和预共享密钥。

contents.text: 10.3.1. Terminology
This section details the key management protocol that makes use of pre-shared secrets.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节详细介绍了使用预共享机密的密钥管理协议。

contents.text: The following notations are used throughout this section:
contents.zh-CHS: 本节使用以下符号：

contents.text: o PSK - the pre-shared key shared between the WTP and the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o PSK-WTP和AC之间共享的预共享密钥。

contents.text: o Kpriv - the private key of a public-private key pair.
contents.zh-CHS: o Kpriv—公私密钥对的私钥。

contents.text: o Kpub - the public key of the pair.
contents.zh-CHS: o Kpub—该对的公钥。

contents.text: o SessionID - a randomly generated LWAPP session identifier, provided by the WTP in the Join Request.
contents.zh-CHS: o SessionID—WTP在加入请求中提供的随机生成的LWAPP会话标识符。

contents.text: o E-x{Kpub, M} - RSA encryption of M using X's public key.
contents.zh-CHS: o E-x{Kpub，M}-使用x的公钥对M进行RSA加密。

contents.text: o D-x{Kpriv, C} - RSA decryption of C using X's private key.
contents.zh-CHS: o D-x{Kpriv，C}-使用x的私钥对C进行RSA解密。

contents.text: o AES-CMAC(key, packet) - A message integrity check, using AES-CMAC and key, of the complete LWAPP packet, with the Sequence Number field and the payload of the PSK-MIC message element set to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: o AES-CMAC（密钥，数据包）-使用AES-CMAC和密钥对完整LWAPP数据包进行消息完整性检查，序列号字段和PSK-MIC消息元素的有效负载设置为零。

contents.text: o AES-E(key, plaintext) - Plaintext is encrypted with key, using AES.
contents.zh-CHS: o AES-E（密钥，明文）-明文使用密钥加密，使用AES。

contents.text: o AES-D(key, ciphertext) - ciphertext is decrypted with key, using AES.
contents.zh-CHS: o AES-D（密钥，密文）-使用AES使用密钥解密密文。

contents.text: o Certificate-AC - AC's Certificate.
contents.zh-CHS: o 证书AC-AC的证书。

contents.text: o Certificate-WTP - WTP's Certificate.
contents.zh-CHS: o 证书WTP-WTP的证书。

contents.text: o WTP-MAC - The WTP's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP-MAC—WTP的MAC地址。

contents.text: o AC-MAC - The AC's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC-MAC-AC的MAC地址。

contents.text: o RK0 - the root key, which is created through a Key Derivation Function (KDF) function.
contents.zh-CHS: o RK0—根密钥，通过密钥派生函数（KDF）函数创建。

contents.text: o RK0E - the root Encryption key, derived from RK0.
contents.zh-CHS: o RK0E—根加密密钥，从RK0派生。

contents.text: o RK0M - the root MIC key, derived from RK0.
contents.zh-CHS: o RK0M-根麦克风键，源自RK0。

contents.text: o SK1 - the session key.
contents.zh-CHS: o SK1-会话密钥。

contents.text: o SK1C - the session confirmation key, derived from SK.
contents.zh-CHS: o SK1C—会话确认密钥，源自SK。

contents.text: o SK1E - the session encryption key, derived from SK.
contents.zh-CHS: o SK1E—会话加密密钥，从SK派生。

contents.text: o SK1W - the session keywrap key, derived from SK (see RFC 3394 [9]).
contents.zh-CHS: o SK1W—会话密钥封装密钥，源自SK（请参阅RFC 3394[9]）。

contents.text: o WNonce - The WTP's randomly generated nonce.
contents.zh-CHS: o WNonce-WTP随机生成的nonce。

contents.text: o ANonce - The AC's randomly generated nonce.
contents.zh-CHS: o ANonce—AC随机生成的nonce。

contents.text: o EWNonce - The payload of the WNonce message element, which includes the WNonce.
contents.zh-CHS: o EWNonce—WNonce消息元素的有效负载，包括WNonce。

contents.text: o EANonce - The payload of the ANonce message element, which includes the ANonce.
contents.zh-CHS: o EANonce—ANonce消息元素的有效负载，包括ANonce。

contents.text: 10.3.2. Initial Key Generation
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2. 初始密钥生成

contents.text: The AC and WTP accomplish mutual authentication and a cryptographic key exchange in a dual round trip using the Join Request, Join Response, Join ACK, and Join Confirm (see Section 6.1).
contents.zh-CHS: AC和WTP使用加入请求、加入响应、加入确认和加入确认（见第6.1节）在双往返过程中完成相互认证和加密密钥交换。

contents.text: The following text describes the exchange between the WTP and the AC that creates a session key, which is used to secure LWAPP control messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下文字描述了WTP和AC之间的交换，该交换创建了会话密钥，用于保护LWAPP控制消息。

contents.text: o The WTP creates a Join Request using the following process:
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP使用以下过程创建加入请求：

contents.text: o If certificate-based security is used, the WTP adds the Certificate message element (see Section 6.1.6) with its contents set to Certificate-WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用基于证书的安全性，WTP将添加证书消息元素（参见第6.1.6节），其内容设置为证书WTP。

contents.text: o The WTP adds the Session ID message element (see Section 6.1.7) with the contents set to a randomly generated session identifier (see RFC 1750 [4]). The WTP MUST save the Session ID in order to validate the Join Response.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP添加会话ID消息元素（见第6.1.7节），内容设置为随机生成的会话标识符（见RFC 1750[4]）。WTP必须保存会话ID以验证加入响应。

contents.text: o The WTP creates a random nonce, included in the XNonce message element (see Section 6.1.9). The WTP MUST save the XNonce to validate the Join Response.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP创建一个随机nonce，包含在XNonce消息元素中（参见第6.1.9节）。WTP必须保存XNonce以验证加入响应。

contents.text: o The WTP transmits the Join Request to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将加入请求发送给AC。

contents.text: o Upon receiving the Join Request, the AC uses the following process:
contents.zh-CHS: o 收到加入请求后，AC使用以下过程：

contents.text: o The AC creates the Join Response, and ensures that the Session ID message element matches the value found in the Join Request.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC创建连接响应，并确保会话ID消息元素与连接请求中的值匹配。

contents.text: o If certificate-based security is used, the AC:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用基于证书的安全性，则AC：

contents.text: o adds the Certificate-AC to the Certificate message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将证书AC添加到证书消息元素。

contents.text: o creates a random 'AC Nonce' and encrypts it using the following algorithm E-wtp(Kpub, XNonce XOR 'AC Nonce'). The encrypted contents are added to the ANonce's message element payload.
contents.zh-CHS: o 创建一个随机的“acnonce”，并使用以下算法E-wtp（Kpub、XNonce或“acnonce”）对其进行加密。加密内容被添加到ANonce的消息元素有效负载中。

contents.text: o If a pre-shared-key-based security is used, the AC:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用基于预共享密钥的安全性，则AC：

contents.text: o creates RK0 through the following algorithm: RK0 = KDF-256{PSK, "LWAPP PSK Top K0" || Session ID || WTP-MAC || AC-MAC}, where WTP-MAC is the WTP's MAC address in the form "xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx". Similarly, the AC-MAC is an ASCII encoding of the AC's MAC address, of the form "xx:xx:xx:xx: xx:xx". The resulting K0 is split into the following:
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过以下算法创建RK0:RK0=KDF-256{PSK，“LWAPP PSK Top K0”| | |会话ID | | WTP-MAC | | AC-MAC}，其中WTP-MAC是WTP的MAC地址，格式为“xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx”。类似地，AC-MAC是AC的MAC地址的ASCII编码，其形式为“xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx”。生成的K0分为以下几部分：

contents.text: o The first 16 octets are known as RK0E, and are used as an encryption key.
contents.zh-CHS: o 前16个八位字节称为RK0E，用作加密密钥。

contents.text: o The second 16 octets are known as RK0M, and are used for MIC'ing purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: o 第二个16个八位字节被称为RK0M，用于话筒目的。

contents.text: o The AC creates a random 'AC Nonce' and encrypts it using the following algorithm: AES-E(RK0E, XNonce XOR 'AC Nonce'). The encrypted contents are added to the ANonce's message element payload.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC创建一个随机“AC Nonce”，并使用以下算法对其进行加密：AES-E（RK0E，XNonce XOR“AC Nonce”）。加密内容被添加到ANonce的消息元素有效负载中。

contents.text: o The AC adds a MIC to the contents of the Join Response using AES-CMAC(RK0M, Join Response) and adds the resulting hash to the PSK-MIC (Section 6.2.9) message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC使用AES-CMAC（RK0M，连接响应）将MIC添加到连接响应的内容中，并将结果哈希添加到PSK-MIC（第6.2.9节）消息元素中。

contents.text: o Upon receiving the Join Response, the WTP uses the following process:
contents.zh-CHS: o 在接收到加入响应后，WTP使用以下过程：

contents.text: o If a pre-shared key is used, the WTP authenticates the Join Response's PSK-MIC message element. If authentication fails, the packet is dropped.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用了预共享密钥，WTP将验证加入响应的PSK-MIC消息元素。如果身份验证失败，数据包将被丢弃。

contents.text: o The WTP decrypts the ANonce message element and XOR's the value with XNonce to retrieve the 'AC Nonce'. The ANonce payload is referred to as ciphertext below:
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP解密ANonce消息元素，并使用XNonce对值进行异或，以检索“acnonce”。ANonce有效载荷在下文中称为密文：

contents.text: o If a pre-shared key is used, use AES-D(RK0E, ciphertext). The 'AC Nonce' is then recovered using XNonce XOR plaintext.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用预共享密钥，请使用AES-D（RK0E，密文）。然后使用XNonce XOR明文恢复“AC Nonce”。

contents.text: o If certificates are used, use d-wtp(Kpriv, ciphertext). The 'AC Nonce' is then recovered using XNonce XOR plaintext.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用证书，则使用d-wtp（Kpriv，密文）。然后使用XNonce XOR明文恢复“AC Nonce”。

contents.text: o The WTP creates a random 'WTP Nonce'.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP创建一个随机的“WTP Nonce”。

contents.text: o The WTP uses the KDF function to create a 64-octet session key (SK). The KDF function used is as follows: KDF-512{'WTP Nonce' || 'AC Nonce', "LWAPP Key Generation", WTP-MAC || AC-MAC}. The KDF function is defined in [7].
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP使用KDF函数创建64个八位字节的会话密钥（SK）。使用的KDF函数如下：KDF-512{'WTP Nonce'| | |'AC Nonce'，“LWAPP密钥生成”，WTP-MAC | | AC-MAC}。KDF函数在[7]中定义。

contents.text: o SK is then broken down into three separate session keys with different purposes:
contents.zh-CHS: o 然后将SK分解为三个不同用途的单独会话密钥：

contents.text: o The first 16 octets are known as SK1C, and are used as a confirmation key.
contents.zh-CHS: o 前16个八位字节称为SK1C，用作确认密钥。

contents.text: o The second 16 octets are known as SK1E, and are as the encryption key.
contents.zh-CHS: o 第二个16个八位字节称为SK1E，用作加密密钥。

contents.text: o The third 16 octets are known as SK1D, and are used as the keywrap key.
contents.zh-CHS: o 第三个16个八位字节被称为SK1D，用作环绕键。

contents.text: o The fourth 16 octets are known as IV, and are used as the Initialization Vector during encryption.
contents.zh-CHS: o 第四个16个八位字节称为IV，在加密期间用作初始化向量。

contents.text: o The WTP creates the Join ACK message.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP创建加入确认消息。
