contents.text: o If certificate-based security is used, the AC:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用基于证书的安全性，则AC：

contents.text: o encrypts the 'WTP Nonce' using the following algorithm: E-ac(Kpub, 'WTP Nonce'). The encrypted contents are added to the WNonce's message element payload.
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用以下算法加密“WTP Nonce”：E-ac（Kpub，“WTP Nonce”）。加密的内容被添加到WNonce的消息元素有效负载中。

contents.text: o If a pre-shared-key-based security is used, the AC:
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用基于预共享密钥的安全性，则AC：

contents.text: o encrypts the 'WTP Nonce' using the following algorithm: AES-E(RK0E, 'WTP Nonce'). The encrypted contents are added to the WNonce's message element payload.
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用以下算法加密“WTP Nonce”：AES-E（RK0E，“WTP Nonce”）。加密的内容被添加到WNonce的消息元素有效负载中。

contents.text: o The WTP adds a MIC to the contents of the Join ACK using AES-CMAC(SK1M, Join ACK) and adds the resulting hash to the PSK-MIC (Section 6.2.9) message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP使用AES-CMAC（SK1M，Join ACK）将MIC添加到Join ACK的内容中，并将结果哈希添加到PSK-MIC（第6.2.9节）消息元素中。

contents.text: o The WTP then transmits the Join ACK to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o 然后，WTP将加入ACK发送给AC。

contents.text: o Upon receiving the Join ACK, the AC uses the following process:
contents.zh-CHS: o 收到加入确认后，AC使用以下过程：

contents.text: o The AC authenticates the Join ACK through the PSK-MIC message element. If authentic, the AC decrypts the WNonce message element to retrieve the 'WTP Nonce'. If the Join ACK cannot be authenticated, the packet is dropped.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC通过PSK-MIC消息元素验证加入ACK。如果是可信的，AC将解密WNOCE消息元素以检索“WTP Nonce”。如果无法对加入确认进行身份验证，则数据包将被丢弃。

contents.text: o The AC decrypts the WNonce message element to retrieve the 'WTP Nonce'. The WNonce payload is referred to as ciphertext below:
contents.zh-CHS: o AC解密WNonce消息元素以检索“WTP Nonce”。WNOCE有效载荷在下文中称为密文：

contents.text: o If a pre-shared key is used, use AES-D(RK0E, ciphertext). The plaintext is then considered the 'WTP Nonce'.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用预共享密钥，请使用AES-D（RK0E，密文）。然后将明文视为“WTP Nonce”。

contents.text: o If certificates are used, use d-ac(Kpriv, ciphertext). The plaintext is then considered the 'WTP Nonce'.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果使用证书，请使用d-ac（Kpriv，密文）。然后将明文视为“WTP Nonce”。

contents.text: o The AC then uses the KDF function to create a 64-octet session key (SK). The KDF function used is as follows: KDF-512{'WTP Nonce' || 'AC Nonce', "LWAPP Key Generation", WTP-MAC || AC-MAC}. The KDF function is defined in [7]. The SK is split into SK1C, SK1E, SK1D, and IV, as previously noted.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC然后使用KDF函数创建64个八位字节的会话密钥（SK）。使用的KDF函数如下：KDF-512{'WTP Nonce'| | |'AC Nonce'，“LWAPP密钥生成”，WTP-MAC | | AC-MAC}。KDF函数在[7]中定义。如前所述，SK分为SK1C、SK1E、SK1D和IV。

contents.text: o The AC creates the Join Confirm.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC创建联接确认。

contents.text: o The AC adds a MIC to the contents of the Join Confirm using AES-CMAC(SK1M, Join Confirm) and adds the resulting hash to the MIC (Section 6.2.9) message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC使用AES-CMAC（SK1M，连接确认）将MIC添加到连接确认的内容中，并将结果哈希添加到MIC（第6.2.9节）消息元素中。

contents.text: o The AC then transmits the Join Confirm to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: o 然后，AC将加入确认发送到WTP。

contents.text: o Upon receiving the Join Confirm, the WTP uses the following process:
contents.zh-CHS: o 收到加入确认后，WTP使用以下过程：

contents.text: o The WTP authenticates the Join Confirm through the PSK-MIC message element. If the Join Confirm cannot be authenticated, the packet is dropped.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP通过PSK-MIC消息元素验证加入确认。如果连接确认无法通过身份验证，则数据包将被丢弃。

contents.text: o SK1E is now plumbed into the AC and WTP's crypto engine as the AES-CCM LWAPP control encryption session key. Furthermore, the random IV is used as the base Initialization Vector. From this point on, all control protocol payloads between the WTP and AC are encrypted and authenticated using the new session key.
contents.zh-CHS: o SK1E现在作为AES-CCM LWAPP控制加密会话密钥插入AC和WTP的加密引擎。此外，随机IV被用作基本初始化向量。从这一点开始，WTP和AC之间的所有控制协议有效负载都将使用新的会话密钥进行加密和身份验证。

contents.text: 10.3.3. Refreshing Cryptographic Keys
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.3. 刷新加密密钥

contents.text: Since AC-WTP associations will tend to be relatively long-lived, it is sensible to periodically refresh the encryption and authentication keys; this is referred to as "rekeying". When the key lifetime reaches 95% of the configured value, identified in the KeyLifetime timer (see Section 12), the rekeying will proceed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 由于AC-WTP关联的寿命相对较长，因此定期刷新加密和身份验证密钥是明智的；这被称为“重新键入”。当钥匙寿命达到钥匙寿命计时器（见第12节）中确定的配置值的95%时，重新钥匙将按如下方式进行：

contents.text: o The WTP creates RK0 through the previously defined KDF algorithm: RK0 = KDF-256{SK1D, "LWAPP PSK Top K0" || Session ID || WTP-MAC || AC-MAC}. Note that the difference in this specific instance is that SK1D that was previously generated is used instead of the PSK. Note this is used in both the certificate and pre-shared key modes. The resulting RK0 creates RK0E, RK0M.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP通过先前定义的KDF算法创建RK0:RK0=KDF-256{SK1D，“LWAPP PSK Top K0”| | |会话ID | | WTP-MAC | | AC-MAC}。请注意，此特定实例中的区别在于使用了先前生成的SK1D而不是PSK。注意：这在证书和预共享密钥模式中都使用。结果RK0创建RK0E，RK0M。

contents.text: o The remaining steps used are identical to the join process, with the exception that the rekey messages are used instead of join messages, and the fact that the messages are encrypted using the previously created SK1E. This means the Join Request is replaced with the Rekey Request, the Join Response is replaced with the Rekey Response, etc. The two differences between the rekey and the join process are:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所使用的其余步骤与加入过程相同，只是使用了重新密钥消息而不是加入消息，并且使用先前创建的SK1E对消息进行了加密。这意味着加入请求被替换为重新密钥请求，加入响应被替换为重新密钥响应，等等。重新密钥和加入过程之间的两个区别是：

contents.text: o The Certificate-WTP and Certificate-AC are not included in the Rekey-Request and Rekey-Response, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: o 证书WTP和证书AC分别不包括在重新密钥请求和重新密钥响应中。

contents.text: o Regardless of whether certificates or pre-shared keys were used in the initial key derivation, the process now uses the pre-shared key mode only, using SK1D as the "PSK".
contents.zh-CHS: o 无论初始密钥派生中使用的是证书还是预共享密钥，该过程现在仅使用预共享密钥模式，使用SK1D作为“PSK”。

contents.text: o The Key Update Request is sent to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o 密钥更新请求被发送到AC。

contents.text: o The newly created SK1E is now plumbed into the AC and WTP's crypto engine as the AES-CCM LWAPP control encryption session key. Furthermore, the new random IV is used as the base Initialization Vector. From this point on, all control protocol payloads between the WTP and AC are encrypted and authenticated using the new session key.
contents.zh-CHS: o 新创建的SK1E现在作为AES-CCM LWAPP控制加密会话密钥插入AC和WTP的加密引擎。此外，新的随机IV被用作基本初始化向量。从这一点开始，WTP和AC之间的所有控制协议有效负载都将使用新的会话密钥进行加密和身份验证。

contents.text: If either the WTP or the AC do not receive an expected response by the time the ResponseTimeout timer expires (see Section 12), the WTP MUST delete the new and old session information, and reset the state machine to the Idle state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果WTP或AC在ResponseTimeout计时器到期时未收到预期响应（参见第12节），则WTP必须删除新的和旧的会话信息，并将状态机重置为空闲状态。

contents.text: Following a rekey process, both the WTP and the AC keep the previous encryption for 5-10 seconds in order to be able to process packets that arrive out of order.
contents.zh-CHS: 在重新密钥过程之后，WTP和AC都将先前的加密保持5-10秒，以便能够处理无序到达的数据包。

contents.text: 10.4. Certificate Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4. 证书使用

contents.text: Validation of the certificates by the AC and WTP is required so that only an AC may perform the functions of an AC and that only a WTP may perform the functions of a WTP. This restriction of functions to the AC or WTP requires that the certificates used by the AC MUST be distinguishable from the certificate used by the WTP. To accomplish this differentiation, the x.509v3 certificates MUST include the Extensions field [10] and MUST include the NetscapeComment [11] extension.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要AC和WTP对证书进行验证，以便只有AC可以执行AC的功能，并且只有WTP可以执行WTP的功能。对AC或WTP的功能限制要求AC使用的证书必须与WTP使用的证书区分开来。为了实现这一区别，x.509v3证书必须包括Extensions字段[10]和NetscapeComment[11]扩展。

contents.text: For an AC, the value of the NetscapeComment extension MUST be the string "CAPWAP AC Device Certificate". For a WTP, the value of the NetscapeComment extension MUST be the string "CAPWAP WTP Device Certificate".
contents.zh-CHS: 对于AC，NetscapeComment扩展名的值必须是字符串“CAPWAP AC设备证书”。对于WTP，NetscapeComment扩展名的值必须是字符串“CAPWAP WTP设备证书”。

contents.text: Part of the LWAPP certificate validation process includes ensuring that the proper string is included in the NetscapeComment extension, and only allowing the LWAPP session to be established if the extension does not represent the same role as the device validating the certificate. For instance, a WTP MUST NOT accept a certificate whose NetscapeComment field is set to "CAPWAP WTP Device Certificate".
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP证书验证过程的一部分包括确保NetscapeComment扩展中包含正确的字符串，并且仅当扩展不代表与验证证书的设备相同的角色时，才允许建立LWAPP会话。例如，WTP不得接受NetscapeComment字段设置为“CAPWAP WTP设备证书”的证书。

contents.text: 11. IEEE 802.11 Binding
contents.zh-CHS: 11. IEEE 802.11绑定

contents.text: This section defines the extensions required for the LWAPP protocol to be used with the IEEE 802.11 protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了与IEEE 802.11协议一起使用的LWAPP协议所需的扩展。

contents.text: 11.1. Division of Labor
The LWAPP protocol, when used with IEEE 802.11 devices, requires a specific behavior from the WTP and the AC, specifically in terms of which 802.11 protocol functions are handled.
contents.zh-CHS: 当与IEEE 802.11设备一起使用时，LWAPP协议需要WTP和AC的特定行为，特别是在处理802.11协议功能方面。

contents.text: For both the Split and Local MAC approaches, the CAPWAP functions, as defined in the taxonomy specification, reside in the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于拆分和本地MAC方法，分类规范中定义的CAPWAP函数驻留在AC中。

contents.text: 11.1.1. Split MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 11.1.1. 拆分MAC

contents.text: This section shows the division of labor between the WTP and the AC in a Split MAC architecture. Figure 3 shows the clear separation of functionality among LWAPP components.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节显示了在拆分MAC架构中WTP和AC之间的分工。图3显示了LWAPP组件之间功能的清晰分离。

contents.text: Function Location Distribution Service AC Integration Service AC Beacon Generation WTP Probe Response WTP Power Mgmt/Packet Buffering WTP Fragmentation/Defragmentation WTP Assoc/Disassoc/Reassoc AC
contents.zh-CHS: 功能定位分发服务AC集成服务AC信标生成WTP探测响应WTP电源管理/数据包缓冲WTP碎片/碎片整理WTP Assoc/Disassoc/Reassoc AC

contents.text: 802.11e Classifying AC Scheduling WTP/AC Queuing WTP
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11e分类AC调度WTP/AC队列WTP

contents.text: 802.11i 802.1X/EAP AC Key Management AC 802.11 Encryption/Decryption WTP or AC
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11i 802.1X/EAP AC密钥管理AC 802.11加密/解密WTP或AC

contents.text: Figure 3: Mapping of 802.11 Functions for Split MAC Architecture
contents.zh-CHS: 图3：分割MAC架构的802.11功能映射

contents.text: The Distribution and Integration services reside on the AC, and therefore all user data is tunneled between the WTP and the AC. As noted above, all real-time 802.11 services, including the control protocol and the beacon and Probe Response frames, are handled on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 分发和集成服务驻留在AC上，因此所有用户数据在WTP和AC之间通过隧道传输。如上所述，所有实时802.11服务，包括控制协议、信标和探测响应帧，都在WTP上处理。

contents.text: All remaining 802.11 MAC management frames are supported on the AC, including the Association Request, which allows the AC to be involved in the access policy enforcement portion of the 802.11 protocol. The 802.1X and 802.11i key management function are also located on the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: AC上支持所有剩余的802.11 MAC管理帧，包括允许AC参与802.11协议的访问策略实施部分的关联请求。802.1X和802.11i密钥管理功能也位于AC上。

contents.text: While the admission control component of 802.11e resides on the AC, the real-time scheduling and queuing functions are on the WTP. Note that this does not exclude the AC from providing additional policing and scheduling functionality.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11e的准入控制组件位于AC上，而实时调度和排队功能位于WTP上。注意，这并不排除AC提供额外的管理和调度功能。

contents.text: Note that in the following figure, the use of '( - )' indicates that processing of the frames is done on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，在下图中，使用“（”）表示在WTP上完成帧的处理。

contents.text: Client WTP AC
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端WTP AC

contents.text: Figure 4: Split MAC Message Flow
contents.zh-CHS: 图4：拆分MAC消息流

contents.text: Figure 4 provides an illustration of the division of labor in a Split MAC architecture. In this example, a WLAN has been created that is configured for 802.11i, using AES-CCMP for privacy. The following process occurs:
contents.zh-CHS: 图4提供了拆分MAC体系结构中的分工说明。在此示例中，已创建了配置为802.11i的WLAN，使用AES-CCMP保护隐私。发生以下过程：

contents.text: o The WTP generates the 802.11 beacon frames, using information provided to it through the Add WLAN (see Section 11.8.1.1) message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP使用通过添加WLAN（参见第11.8.1.1节）消息元素提供给它的信息生成802.11信标帧。

contents.text: o The WTP processes the Probe Request and responds with a corresponding Probe Response. The problem request is then forwarded to the AC for optional processing.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP处理探测请求并用相应的探测响应进行响应。然后将问题请求转发给AC进行可选处理。

contents.text: o The WTP forwards the 802.11 Authentication and Association frames to the AC, which is responsible for responding to the client.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将802.11认证和关联帧转发给AC，AC负责响应客户端。

contents.text: o Once the association is complete, the AC transmits an LWAPP Add Mobile Request to the WTP (see Section 11.7.1.1). In the above example, the WLAN is configured for 802.1X, and therefore the '802.1X only' policy bit is enabled.
contents.zh-CHS: o 关联完成后，AC向WTP发送LWAPP添加移动请求（见第11.7.1.1节）。在上述示例中，WLAN配置为802.1X，因此启用了“仅802.1X”策略位。

contents.text: o If the WTP is providing encryption/decryption services, once the client has completed the 802.11i key exchange, the AC transmits another Add Mobile Request to the WTP, stating the security policy to enforce for the client (in this case AES-CCMP), as well as the
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果WTP提供加密/解密服务，一旦客户端完成802.11i密钥交换，AC将向WTP发送另一个添加移动请求，说明要为客户端强制执行的安全策略（在本例中为AES-CCMP），以及

contents.text: encryption key to use. If encryption/decryption is handled in the AC, the Add Mobile Request would have the encryption policy set to "Clear Text".
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用的加密密钥。如果在AC中处理加密/解密，则添加移动请求的加密策略将设置为“明文”。

contents.text: o The WTP forwards any 802.11 Action frames received to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将接收到的任何802.11动作帧转发给AC。

contents.text: o All client data frames are tunneled between the WTP and the AC. Note that the WTP is responsible for encrypting and decrypting frames, if it was indicated in the Add Mobile Request.
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有客户端数据帧都在WTP和AC之间进行隧道传输。请注意，如果在添加移动请求中指出，WTP负责对帧进行加密和解密。

contents.text: 11.1.2. Local MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 11.1.2. 本地MAC

contents.text: This section shows the division of labor between the WTP and the AC in a Local MAC architecture. Figure 5 shows the clear separation of functionality among LWAPP components.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节显示了本地MAC体系结构中WTP和AC之间的分工。图5显示了LWAPP组件之间功能的清晰分离。

contents.text: Function Location Distribution Service WTP Integration Service WTP Beacon Generation WTP Probe Response WTP Power Mgmt/Packet Buffering WTP Fragmentation/Defragmentation WTP Assoc/Disassoc/Reassoc WTP
contents.zh-CHS: 功能位置分发服务WTP集成服务WTP信标生成WTP探测响应WTP电源管理/数据包缓冲WTP碎片/碎片整理WTP Assoc/Disassoc/Reassoc WTP

contents.text: 802.11e Classifying WTP Scheduling WTP Queuing WTP
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11e分类WTP调度WTP队列WTP

contents.text: 802.11i 802.1X/EAP AC Key Management AC 802.11 Encryption/Decryption WTP
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11i 802.1X/EAP AC密钥管理AC 802.11加密/解密WTP

contents.text: Figure 5: Mapping of 802.11 Functions for Local AP Architecture
contents.zh-CHS: 图5：本地AP架构的802.11功能映射

contents.text: Given that Distribution and Integration Services exist on the WTP, client data frames are not forwarded to the AC, with the exception listed in the following paragraphs.
contents.zh-CHS: 鉴于WTP上存在分发和集成服务，客户机数据帧不会转发给AC，以下段落中列出的例外情况除外。

contents.text: While the MAC is terminated on the WTP, it is necessary for the AC to be aware of mobility events within the WTPs. As a consequence, the WTP MUST forward the 802.11 Association Requests to the AC, and the AC MAY reply with a failed Association Response if it deems it necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: 当MAC在WTP上终止时，AC有必要知道WTP内的移动性事件。因此，WTP必须将802.11关联请求转发给AC，如果AC认为有必要，可以使用失败的关联响应进行回复。

contents.text: The 802.1X and 802.11i Key Management function resides in the AC. Therefore, the WTP MUST forward all 802.1X/Key Management frames to the AC and forward the associated responses to the station.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.1X和802.11i密钥管理功能位于AC中。因此，WTP必须将所有802.1X/密钥管理帧转发给AC，并将相关响应转发给站点。

contents.text: Note that in the following figure, the use of '( - )' indicates that processing of the frames is done on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，在下图中，使用“（”）表示在WTP上完成帧的处理。

contents.text: Client WTP AC
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端WTP AC

contents.text: Figure 6: Local MAC Message Flow
contents.zh-CHS: 图6：本地MAC消息流

contents.text: Figure 6 provides an illustration of the division of labor in a Local MAC architecture. In this example, a WLAN has been created that is configured for 802.11i, using AES-CCMP for privacy. The following process occurs:
contents.zh-CHS: 图6展示了本地MAC架构中的分工。在此示例中，已创建了配置为802.11i的WLAN，使用AES-CCMP保护隐私。发生以下过程：

contents.text: o The WTP generates the 802.11 beacon frames, using information provided to it through the Add WLAN (see Section 11.8.1.1) message element.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP使用通过添加WLAN（参见第11.8.1.1节）消息元素提供给它的信息生成802.11信标帧。

contents.text: o The WTP processes the Probe Request and responds with a corresponding Probe Response.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP处理探测请求并用相应的探测响应进行响应。

contents.text: o The WTP forwards the 802.11 Authentication and Association frames to the AC, which is responsible for responding to the client.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将802.11认证和关联帧转发给AC，AC负责响应客户端。

contents.text: o Once the association is complete, the AC transmits an LWAPP Add Mobile Request to the WTP (see Section 11.7.1.1. In the above example, the WLAN is configured for 802.1X, and therefore the '802.1X only' policy bit is enabled.
contents.zh-CHS: o 关联完成后，AC向WTP发送LWAPP添加移动请求（请参阅第11.7.1.1节）。在上述示例中，WLAN配置为802.1X，因此启用了“仅802.1X”策略位。

contents.text: o The WTP forwards all 802.1X and 802.11i key exchange messages to the AC for processing.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将所有802.1X和802.11i密钥交换消息转发给AC进行处理。

contents.text: o The AC transmits another Add Mobile Request to the WTP, stating the security policy to enforce for the client (in this case, AES-CCMP), as well as the encryption key to use. The Add Mobile Request MAY include a VLAN name, which when present is used by the WTP to identify the VLAN on which the user's data frames are to be bridged.
contents.zh-CHS: o AC向WTP发送另一个添加移动请求，说明要为客户端强制执行的安全策略（在本例中为AES-CCMP）以及要使用的加密密钥。添加移动请求可以包括VLAN名称，当存在该名称时，WTP使用该名称来标识要在其上桥接用户的数据帧的VLAN。

contents.text: o The WTP forwards any 802.11 Action frames received to the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP将接收到的任何802.11动作帧转发给AC。

contents.text: o The WTP locally bridges all client data frames, and provides the necessary encryption and decryption services.
contents.zh-CHS: o WTP在本地桥接所有客户端数据帧，并提供必要的加密和解密服务。

contents.text: 11.2. Roaming Behavior and 802.11 Security

It is important that LWAPP implementations react properly to mobile devices associating to the networks in how they generate Add Mobile and Delete Mobile messages. This section expands upon the examples provided in the previous section, and describes how the LWAPP control protocol is used in order to provide secure roaming.
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP实现对与网络关联的移动设备如何生成“添加移动”和“删除移动消息”做出正确反应非常重要。本节对上一节中提供的示例进行了扩展，并描述了如何使用LWAPP控制协议来提供安全漫游。

contents.text: Once a client has successfully associated with the network in a secure fashion, it is likely to attempt to roam to another access point. Figure 7 shows an example of a currently associated station moving from its "Old WTP" to a new "WTP". The figure is useful for multiple different security policies, including standard 802.1X and dynamic WEP keys, WPA or even WPA2 both with key caching (where the 802.1x exchange would be bypassed) and without.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦客户机以安全的方式成功地与网络关联，它就可能尝试漫游到另一个接入点。图7显示了当前关联站点从其“旧WTP”移动到新“WTP”的示例。该图适用于多种不同的安全策略，包括标准802.1X和动态WEP密钥、WPA甚至WPA2，它们都具有密钥缓存（其中802.1X交换将被绕过）和不具有密钥缓存。

contents.text: Client Old WTP WTP AC
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端旧WTP WTP AC

contents.text: Figure 7: Client Roaming Example
contents.zh-CHS: 图7：客户端漫游示例

contents.text: 11.3. Transport-Specific Bindings
contents.zh-CHS: 11.3. 特定于传输的绑定

contents.text: All LWAPP transports have the following IEEE 802.11 specific bindings:
contents.zh-CHS: 所有LWAPP传输具有以下IEEE 802.11特定绑定：

contents.text: 11.3.1. Status and WLANS Field
contents.zh-CHS: 11.3.1. 状态和无线局域网字段

contents.text: The interpretation of this 16-bit field depends on the direction of transmission of the packet. Refer to the figure in Section 3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 该16位字段的解释取决于数据包的传输方向。参考第3.1节中的图。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: When an LWAPP packet is transmitted from a WTP to an AC, this field is called the Status field and indicates radio resource information associated with the frame. When the message is an LWAPP control message this field is transmitted as zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 当LWAPP分组从WTP传输到AC时，该字段称为状态字段，并指示与帧相关联的无线电资源信息。当消息为LWAPP控制消息时，此字段以零传输。

contents.text: The Status field is divided into the signal strength and signal-to-noise ratio with which an IEEE 802.11 frame was received, encoded in the following manner:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态字段被划分为接收IEEE 802.11帧的信号强度和信噪比，并以以下方式编码：

contents.text: RSSI: RSSI is a signed, 8-bit value. It is the received signal strength indication, in dBm.
contents.zh-CHS: RSSI:RSSI是一个有符号的8位值。它是接收信号强度指示，单位为dBm。

contents.text: SNR: SNR is a signed, 8-bit value. It is the signal-to-noise ratio of the received IEEE 802.11 frame, in dB.
contents.zh-CHS: SNR:SNR是一个有符号的8位值。它是接收到的IEEE 802.11帧的信噪比，单位为dB。

contents.text: WLANs field: When an LWAPP data message is transmitted from an AC to a WTP, this 16-bit field indicates on which WLANs the encapsulated IEEE 802.11 frame is to be transmitted. For unicast packets, this field is not used by the WTP. For broadcast or multicast packets, the WTP might require this information if it provides encryption services.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN字段：当LWAPP数据消息从AC传输到WTP时，此16位字段指示封装的IEEE 802.11帧将在哪个WLAN上传输。对于单播数据包，WTP不使用此字段。对于广播或多播数据包，如果WTP提供加密服务，则可能需要此信息。

contents.text: Given that a single broadcast or multicast packet might need to be sent to multiple wireless LANs (presumably each with a different broadcast key), this field is defined as a bit field. A bit set indicates a WLAN ID (see Section 11.8.1.1), which will be sent the data. The WLANS field is encoded in the following manner:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑到单个广播或多播数据包可能需要发送到多个无线LAN（可能每个LAN具有不同的广播密钥），此字段定义为位字段。位集表示将发送数据的WLAN ID（见第11.8.1.1节）。WLANS字段按以下方式编码：

contents.text: 11.4. BSSID to WLAN ID Mapping
contents.zh-CHS: 11.4. BSSID到WLAN ID映射

contents.text: The LWAPP protocol makes assumptions regarding the BSSIDs used on the WTP. It is a requirement for the WTP to use a contiguous block of BSSIDs. The WLAN Identifier field, which is managed by the AC, is used as an offset into the BSSID list.
contents.zh-CHS: LWAPP协议对WTP上使用的BSSID进行假设。WTP需要使用连续的BSSID块。由AC管理的WLAN标识符字段用作BSSID列表中的偏移量。

contents.text: For instance, if a WTP had a base BSSID address of 00:01:02:00:00:00, and the AC sent an Add WLAN message with a WLAN Identifier of 2 (see Section 11.8.1.1), the BSSID for the specific WLAN on the WTP would be 00:01:02:00:00:02.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，如果WTP的基本BSSID地址为00:01:02:00:00，并且AC发送了一条WLAN标识符为2的添加WLAN消息（参见第11.8.1.1节），则WTP上特定WLAN的BSSID将为00:01:02:00:02。

contents.text: The WTP communicates the maximum number of BSSIDs that it supports during the Config Request within the IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN Radio Configuration message element (see Section 11.9.1).
contents.zh-CHS: WTP在IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN无线电配置消息元素内的配置请求期间，通信其支持的最大BSSID数量（参见第11.9.1节）。

contents.text: 11.5. Quality of Service
contents.zh-CHS: 11.5. 服务质量

contents.text: It is recommended that 802.11 MAC management be sent by both the AC and the WTP with appropriate Quality-of-Service (QoS) values, ensuring that congestion in the network minimizes occurrences of packet loss. Therefore, a QoS-enabled LWAPP device should use:
contents.zh-CHS: 建议由AC和WTP以适当的服务质量（QoS）值发送802.11 MAC管理，以确保网络中的拥塞最小化分组丢失的发生。因此，启用QoS的LWAPP设备应使用：

contents.text: 802.1P: The precedence value of 6 SHOULD be used for all 802.11 MAC management messages, except for Probe Requests, which SHOULD use 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.1P：所有802.11 MAC管理消息都应使用优先级值6，探测请求除外，它应使用4。

contents.text: DSCP: The DSCP tag value of 46 SHOULD be used for all 802.11 MAC management messages, except for Probe Requests, which SHOULD use 34.
contents.zh-CHS: DSCP：DSCP标记值46应用于所有802.11 MAC管理消息，探测请求除外，它应使用34。

contents.text: 11.6. Data Message Bindings
contents.zh-CHS: 11.6. 数据消息绑定

contents.text: There are no LWAPP data message bindings for IEEE 802.11.
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11没有LWAPP数据消息绑定。

contents.text: 11.7. Control Message Bindings
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7. 控制消息绑定

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 binding has the following control message definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11绑定具有以下控制消息定义。

contents.text: 11.7.1. Mobile Config Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7.1. 移动配置请求

contents.text: This section contains the 802.11-specific message elements that are used with the Mobile Config Request.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含用于移动配置请求的802.11特定消息元素。

contents.text: 11.7.1.1. Add Mobile

The Add Mobile Request is used by the AC to inform a WTP that it should forward traffic from a particular mobile station. The Add Mobile Request may also include security parameters that must be enforced by the WTP for the particular mobile.
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用添加移动请求来通知WTP它应该转发来自特定移动站的流量。添加移动请求还可以包括必须由WTP针对特定移动设备强制执行的安全参数。

contents.text: When the AC sends an Add Mobile Request, it includes any security parameters that may be required. An AC that wishes to update a mobile's policy on a WTP may do so by simply sending a new Add Mobile message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC发送添加移动请求时，它包括可能需要的任何安全参数。希望在WTP上更新移动设备的策略的AC可以通过简单地发送新的Add-mobile消息元素来实现。

contents.text: When a WTP receives an Add Mobile message element, it must first override any existing state it may have for the mobile station in question. The latest Add Mobile overrides any previously received messages. If the Add Mobile message element's EAP-Only bit is set, the WTP MUST drop all 802.11 packets that do not contain EAP packets. Note that when EAP Only is set, the Encryption Policy field MAY have additional values, and therefore it is possible to inform a WTP to only accept encrypted EAP packets. Once the mobile station has successfully completed EAP authentication, the AC must send a new Add Mobile message element to push the session key down to the WTP as well as to remove the EAP Only restriction.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP接收到Add Mobile message元素时，它必须首先覆盖它可能具有的有关移动站的任何现有状态。最新的Add Mobile会覆盖以前收到的任何消息。如果设置了添加移动消息元素的仅EAP位，则WTP必须丢弃所有不包含EAP数据包的802.11数据包。注意，当仅设置EAP时，加密策略字段可能具有附加值，因此可以通知WTP仅接受加密的EAP数据包。一旦移动站成功完成EAP身份验证，AC必须发送一个新的添加移动消息元素，以将会话密钥向下推送到WTP，并删除仅限EAP的限制。

contents.text: If the QoS field is set, the WTP MUST observe and provide policing of the 802.11e priority tag to ensure that it does not exceed the value provided by the AC.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设置了QoS字段，则WTP必须遵守802.11e优先级标签并提供其监管，以确保其不超过AC提供的值。

contents.text: Type: 29 for Add Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：29用于添加手机

contents.text: Length: 36
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：36

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Association ID: A 16-bit value specifying the 802.11 Association Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 关联ID：指定802.11关联标识符的16位值。

contents.text: MAC Address: The mobile station's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：移动台的MAC地址。

contents.text: E: The 1-bit field is set by the AC to inform the WTP that it MUST NOT accept any 802.11 data frames, other than 802.1X frames. This is the equivalent of the WTP's 802.1X port for the mobile station to be in the closed state. When set, the WTP MUST drop any non-802.1X packets it receives from the mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: E：AC设置1位字段以通知WTP不得接受除802.1X帧以外的任何802.11数据帧。这相当于WTP的802.1X端口，移动站处于关闭状态。设置后，WTP必须丢弃它从移动站接收到的任何非802.1X数据包。

contents.text: C: The 1-bit field is set by the AC to inform the WTP that encryption services will be provided by the AC. When set, the WTP SHOULD police frames received from stations to ensure that they comply to the stated encryption policy, but does not need to take specific cryptographic action on the frame. Similarly, for transmitted frames, the WTP only needs to forward already encrypted frames.
contents.zh-CHS: C：1位字段由AC设置，用于通知WTP AC将提供加密服务。设置后，WTP应对从站点接收的帧进行监控，以确保它们符合规定的加密策略，但不需要对帧采取特定的加密操作。类似地，对于传输的帧，WTP只需要转发已经加密的帧。

contents.text: Encryption Policy: The policy field informs the WTP how to handle packets from/to the mobile station. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 加密策略：策略字段通知WTP如何处理来自/到移动站的数据包。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Encrypt WEP 104: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 104-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-加密WEP 104：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准104位WEP加密。

contents.text: 1 - Clear Text: All packets to/from the mobile station do not require any additional crypto processing by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-明文：所有进出移动站的数据包不需要WTP进行任何额外的加密处理。

contents.text: 2 - Encrypt WEP 40: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 40-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-加密WEP 40：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准的40位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 3 - Encrypt WEP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 128-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-加密WEP 128：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用标准128位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 4 - Encrypt AES-CCMP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a 128-bit AES-CCMP [7].
contents.zh-CHS: 4-加密AES-CCMP 128：必须使用128位AES-CCMP对进出移动站的所有数据包进行加密[7]。

contents.text: 5 - Encrypt TKIP-MIC: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using Temporal Key Integrity Protocol (TKIP) and authenticated using Michael [16].
contents.zh-CHS: 5-加密TKIP-MIC：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用临时密钥完整性协议（TKIP）进行加密，并使用Michael进行身份验证[16]。

contents.text: Session Key: A 32-octet session key the WTP is to use when encrypting traffic to or decrypting traffic from the mobile station. The type of key is determined based on the Encryption Policy field.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话密钥：WTP在加密到移动台的通信量或解密来自移动台的通信量时使用的32个八位组的会话密钥。密钥类型根据加密策略字段确定。

contents.text: Pairwise TSC: The TKIP Sequence Counter (TSC) to use for unicast packets transmitted to the mobile.
contents.zh-CHS: 成对TSC：用于传输到移动设备的单播数据包的TKIP序列计数器（TSC）。

contents.text: Pairwise RSC: The Receive Sequence Counter (RSC) to use for unicast packets received from the mobile.
contents.zh-CHS: 成对RSC：用于从移动设备接收的单播数据包的接收序列计数器（RSC）。

contents.text: Capabilities: A 16-bit field containing the 802.11 capabilities to use with the mobile.
contents.zh-CHS: 功能：一个16位字段，包含用于移动设备的802.11功能。

contents.text: WLAN ID: An 8-bit value specifying the WLAN Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：指定WLAN标识符的8位值。

contents.text: WME Mode: An 8-bit Boolean used to identify whether the station is WME capable. A value of zero is used to indicate that the station is not Wireless Multimedia Extension (WME) capable, while a value of one means that the station is WME capable.
contents.zh-CHS: WME模式：一个8位布尔值，用于识别工作站是否具有WME功能。值为零表示站点不支持无线多媒体扩展（WME），而值为1表示站点支持WME。

contents.text: 802.11e Mode: An 8-bit Boolean used to identify whether the station is 802.11e-capable. A value of zero is used to indicate that the station is not 802.11e-capable, while a value of one means that the station is 802.11e-capable.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.11e模式：一个8位布尔值，用于标识站点是否支持802.11e。值0用于表示站点不支持802.11e，而值1表示站点支持802.11e。

contents.text: QoS: An 8-bit value specifying the QoS policy to enforce for the station. The following values are supported: PRC: TO CHECK
contents.zh-CHS: QoS：一个8位值，指定要为站点强制执行的QoS策略。支持以下值：PRC:要检查

contents.text: 0 - Silver (Best Effort)
contents.zh-CHS: 0-银牌（尽力而为）

contents.text: 1 - Gold (Video)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-黄金（视频）

contents.text: 2 - Platinum (Voice)
contents.zh-CHS: 2-白金（语音）

contents.text: 3 - Bronze (Background)
contents.zh-CHS: 3-青铜色（背景）

contents.text: Supported Rates: The supported rates to be used with the mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持的速率：移动站使用的支持速率。

contents.text: VLAN Name: An optional variable string containing the VLAN Name on which the WTP is to locally bridge user data. Note that this field is only valid with Local MAC WTPs.
contents.zh-CHS: VLAN名称：一个可选变量字符串，包含WTP要在其上本地桥接用户数据的VLAN名称。请注意，此字段仅对本地MAC WTP有效。

contents.text: 11.7.1.2. IEEE 802.11 Mobile Session Key
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7.1.2. IEEE 802.11移动会话密钥

contents.text: The Mobile Session Key Payload message element is sent when the AC determines that encryption of a mobile station must be performed in the WTP. This message element MUST NOT be present without the Add Mobile message element, and MUST NOT be sent if the WTP had not specifically advertised support for the requested encryption scheme (see Section 11.7.1.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC确定必须在WTP中执行移动站的加密时，发送移动会话密钥有效载荷消息元素。在没有添加移动消息元素的情况下，此消息元素不得出现，并且如果WTP没有专门公布对请求的加密方案的支持，则不得发送此消息元素（参见第11.7.1.1节）。

contents.text: Type: 105 for IEEE 802.11 Mobile Session Key
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：105用于IEEE 802.11移动会话密钥

contents.text: Length:   >= 11
MAC Address: The mobile station's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：移动台的MAC地址。

contents.text: Encryption Policy: The policy field informs the WTP how to handle packets from/to the mobile station. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 加密策略：策略字段通知WTP如何处理来自/到移动站的数据包。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Encrypt WEP 104: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 104-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-加密WEP 104：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准104位WEP加密。

contents.text: 1 - Clear Text: All packets to/from the mobile station do not require any additional crypto processing by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-明文：所有进出移动站的数据包不需要WTP进行任何额外的加密处理。

contents.text: 2 - Encrypt WEP 40: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 40-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-加密WEP 40：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准的40位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 3 - Encrypt WEP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 128-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-加密WEP 128：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用标准128位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 4 - Encrypt AES-CCMP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a 128-bit AES-CCMP [7].
contents.zh-CHS: 4-加密AES-CCMP 128：必须使用128位AES-CCMP对进出移动站的所有数据包进行加密[7]。

contents.text: 5 - Encrypt TKIP-MIC: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using TKIP and authenticated using Michael [16].
contents.zh-CHS: 5-加密TKIP-MIC：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用TKIP加密，并使用Michael进行身份验证[16]。

contents.text: Session Key: The session key the WTP is to use when encrypting traffic to/from the mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: 会话密钥：WTP在加密进出移动台的流量时要使用的会话密钥。

contents.text: 11.7.1.3. Station QoS Profile
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7.1.3. 站点QoS配置文件

contents.text: The Station QoS Profile Payload message element contains the maximum 802.11e priority tag that may be used by the station. Any packets received that exceed the value encoded in this message element must either be dropped or tagged using the maximum value permitted to the user. The priority tag must be between zero (0) and seven (7).
contents.zh-CHS: 站点QoS配置文件有效负载消息元素包含站点可能使用的最大802.11e优先级标记。接收到的任何超过此消息元素中编码值的数据包必须使用用户允许的最大值丢弃或标记。优先级标记必须介于零（0）和七（7）之间。

contents.text: Type: 140 for IEEE 802.11 Station QoS Profile
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：140适用于IEEE 802.11站点QoS配置文件

contents.text: Length: 12
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：12

contents.text: MAC Address: The mobile station's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：移动台的MAC地址。

contents.text: 802.1P Precedence Tag: The maximum 802.1P precedence value that the WTP will allow in the Traffic Identifier (TID) field in the extended 802.11e QoS Data header.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.1P优先级标记：WTP在扩展的802.11e QoS数据头的流量标识符（TID）字段中允许的最大802.1P优先级值。

contents.text: 11.7.1.4. IEEE 802.11 Update Mobile QoS
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7.1.4. IEEE 802.11更新移动QoS

contents.text: The Update Mobile QoS message element is used to change the Quality-of-Service policy on the WTP for a given mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: 更新移动QoS消息元素用于更改给定移动站的WTP上的服务质量策略。

contents.text: Type: 106 for IEEE 802.11 Update Mobile QoS
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：106用于IEEE 802.11更新移动QoS

contents.text: Length: 14
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：14

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Association ID: The 802.11 Association Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 关联ID：802.11关联标识符。

contents.text: MAC Address: The mobile station's MAC address.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：移动台的MAC地址。

contents.text: QoS Profile: An 8-bit value specifying the QoS policy to enforce for the station. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: QoS配置文件：一个8位值，指定要为站点强制执行的QoS策略。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Silver (Best Effort)
contents.zh-CHS: 0-银牌（尽力而为）

contents.text: 1 - Gold (Video)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-黄金（视频）

contents.text: 2 - Platinum (Voice)
contents.zh-CHS: 2-白金（语音）

contents.text: 3 - Bronze (Background)
contents.zh-CHS: 3-青铜色（背景）

contents.text: VLAN Identifier: PRC.
contents.zh-CHS: VLAN标识符：PRC。

contents.text: DSCP Tag: The DSCP label to use if packets are to be DSCP tagged.
contents.zh-CHS: DSCP标签：如果要对数据包进行DSCP标记，则要使用的DSCP标签。

contents.text: 802.1P Tag: The 802.1P precedence value to use if packets are to be 802.1P-tagged.
contents.zh-CHS: 802.1P标记：如果要对数据包进行802.1P标记，则使用的802.1P优先级值。

contents.text: 11.7.2. WTP Event Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.7.2. WTP事件请求

contents.text: This section contains the 802.11-specific message elements that are used with the WTP Event Request message.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含与WTP事件请求消息一起使用的802.11特定消息元素。

contents.text: 11.7.2.1. IEEE 802.11 Statistics
The Statistics message element is sent by the WTP to transmit its current statistics. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: WTP发送统计信息元素以传输其当前统计信息。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 38 for Statistics
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：38统计

contents.text: Length: 57
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：57

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Tx Fragment Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of fragmented frames transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: Tx Fragment Count：一个32位值，表示传输的碎片帧数。

contents.text: Multicast Tx Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of multicast frames transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 多播发送计数：一个32位的值，表示发送的多播帧数。

contents.text: Failed Count: A 32-bit value representing the transmit excessive retries.
contents.zh-CHS: 失败计数：一个32位值，表示传输重试次数过多。

contents.text: Retry Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of transmit retries.
contents.zh-CHS: 重试次数：表示传输重试次数的32位值。

contents.text: Multiple Retry Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of transmits that required more than one retry.
contents.zh-CHS: 多次重试计数：一个32位值，表示需要多次重试的传输次数。

contents.text: Frame Duplicate Count: A 32-bit value representing the duplicate frames received.
contents.zh-CHS: 帧重复计数：表示接收到的重复帧的32位值。

contents.text: RTS Success Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of successfully transmitted Ready To Send (RTS).
contents.zh-CHS: RTS成功计数：一个32位值，表示成功传输准备发送（RTS）的数量。

contents.text: RTS Failure Count: A 32-bit value representing the failed transmitted RTS.
contents.zh-CHS: RTS故障计数：表示故障传输RTS的32位值。

contents.text: ACK Failure Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of failed acknowledgements.
contents.zh-CHS: ACK Failure Count：一个32位的值，表示失败确认的数量。

contents.text: Rx Fragment Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of fragmented frames received.
contents.zh-CHS: Rx Fragment Count：一个32位的值，表示接收到的碎片帧数。

contents.text: Multicast RX Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of multicast frames received.
contents.zh-CHS: 多播接收计数：表示接收的多播帧数的32位值。

contents.text: FCS Error Count: A 32-bit value representing the number of Frame Check Sequence (FCS) failures.
contents.zh-CHS: FCS错误计数：表示帧检查序列（FCS）故障数的32位值。

contents.text: Decryption Errors: A 32-bit value representing the number of Decryption errors that occurred on the WTP. Note that this field is only valid in cases where the WTP provides encryption/ decryption services.
contents.zh-CHS: 解密错误：32位值，表示WTP上发生的解密错误数。请注意，此字段仅在WTP提供加密/解密服务的情况下有效。

contents.text: 11.8. 802.11 Control Messages
This section will define LWAPP control messages that are specific to the IEEE 802.11 binding.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节将定义特定于IEEE 802.11绑定的LWAPP控制消息。

contents.text: 11.8.1. IEEE 802.11 WLAN Config Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.1. IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置请求

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Request is sent by the AC to the WTP in order to change services provided by the WTP. This control message is used to either create, update, or delete a WLAN on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: AC向WTP发送IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置请求，以更改WTP提供的服务。此控制消息用于在WTP上创建、更新或删除WLAN。

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Request is sent as a result of either some manual administrative process (e.g., deleting a WLAN), or automatically to create a WLAN on a WTP. When sent automatically to create a WLAN, this control message is sent after the LWAPP Configuration Request message has been received by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置请求作为某些手动管理过程（例如，删除WLAN）的结果发送，或自动在WTP上创建WLAN。当自动发送以创建WLAN时，此控制消息在WTP收到LWAPP配置请求消息后发送。

contents.text: Upon receiving this control message, the WTP will modify the necessary services, and transmit an IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Response.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦收到此控制消息，WTP将修改必要的服务，并发送IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置响应。

contents.text: An WTP MAY provide service for more than one WLAN: therefore, every WLAN is identified through a numerical index. For instance, a WTP that is capable of supporting up to 16 SSIDs could accept up to 16 IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Request messages that include the Add WLAN message element.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP可以为多个WLAN提供服务：因此，通过数字索引识别每个WLAN。例如，能够支持多达16个SSID的WTP可以接受多达16个包含添加WLAN消息元素的IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置请求消息。

contents.text: Since the index is the primary identifier for a WLAN, an AC SHOULD attempt to ensure that the same WLAN is identified through the same index number on all of its WTPs. An AC that does not follow this approach MUST find some other means of maintaining a WLAN Identifier to SSID mapping table.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于索引是WLAN的主要标识符，AC应尝试确保通过其所有WTP上的相同索引号识别相同的WLAN。不遵循此方法的AC必须找到其他方法来维护WLAN标识符到SSID映射表。

contents.text: The following subsections define the message elements that are of value for this LWAPP operation. Only one message MUST be present.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下小节定义了对于此LWAPP操作有价值的消息元素。只有一条消息必须存在。

contents.text: 11.8.1.1. IEEE 802.11 Add WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.1.1. IEEE 802.11添加WLAN

contents.text: The Add WLAN message element is used by the AC to define a wireless LAN on the WTP. The value contains the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用添加WLAN消息元素在WTP上定义无线LAN。该值包含以下格式：

contents.text: Type: 7 for IEEE 802.11 Add WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：7适用于IEEE 802.11添加WLAN

contents.text: Length:   >= 298
Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值。

contents.text: WLAN Capability: A 16-bit value containing the capabilities to be advertised by the WTP within the Probe and Beacon messages.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN能力：16位值，包含WTP在探测和信标消息中公布的能力。

contents.text: WLAN ID: A 16-bit value specifying the WLAN Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：指定WLAN标识符的16位值。

contents.text: Encryption Policy: A 32-bit value specifying the encryption scheme to apply to traffic to and from the mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密策略：一个32位的值，指定应用于进出移动站的通信量的加密方案。

contents.text: The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Encrypt WEP 104: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 104-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-加密WEP 104：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准104位WEP加密。

contents.text: 1 - Clear Text: All packets to/from the mobile station do not require any additional crypto processing by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-明文：所有进出移动站的数据包不需要WTP进行任何额外的加密处理。

contents.text: 2 - Encrypt WEP 40: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 40-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-加密WEP 40：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准的40位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 3 - Encrypt WEP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 128-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-加密WEP 128：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用标准128位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 4 - Encrypt AES-CCMP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a 128-bit AES-CCMP [7].
contents.zh-CHS: 4-加密AES-CCMP 128：必须使用128位AES-CCMP对进出移动站的所有数据包进行加密[7]。

contents.text: 5 - Encrypt TKIP-MIC: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using TKIP and authenticated using Michael [16].
contents.zh-CHS: 5-加密TKIP-MIC：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用TKIP加密，并使用Michael进行身份验证[16]。

contents.text: 6 - Encrypt CKIP: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using Cisco TKIP.
contents.zh-CHS: 6-加密CKIP：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用Cisco TKIP加密。

contents.text: Key: A 32-byte session key to use with the encryption policy.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥：用于加密策略的32字节会话密钥。

contents.text: Key-Index: The Key Index associated with the key.
contents.zh-CHS: 键索引：与键关联的键索引。

contents.text: Shared Key: A 1-byte Boolean that specifies whether the key included in the Key field is a shared WEP key. A value of zero is used to state that the key is not a shared WEP key, while a value of one is used to state that the key is a shared WEP key.
contents.zh-CHS: 共享密钥：一个1字节的布尔值，指定密钥字段中包含的密钥是否为共享WEP密钥。值0用于表示密钥不是共享WEP密钥，而值1用于表示密钥是共享WEP密钥。

contents.text: WPA Data Len: Length of the WPA Information Element (IE).
contents.zh-CHS: WPA数据长度：WPA信息元素（IE）的长度。

contents.text: WPA IE: A 32-byte field containing the WPA Information Element.
contents.zh-CHS: WPA IE：包含WPA信息元素的32字节字段。

contents.text: RSN Data Len: Length of the Robust Security Network (RSN) IE.
contents.zh-CHS: RSN数据长度：健壮安全网络（RSN）的长度。

contents.text: RSN IE: A 64-byte field containing the RSN Information Element.
contents.zh-CHS: RSN IE：包含RSN信息元素的64字节字段。

contents.text: Reserved: A 49-byte reserved field, which MUST be set to zero (0).
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：一个49字节的保留字段，必须设置为零（0）。

contents.text: WME Data Len: Length of the WME IE.
contents.zh-CHS: WME数据长度：WME IE的长度。

contents.text: WME IE: A 32-byte field containing the WME Information Element.
contents.zh-CHS: WME IE：包含WME信息元素的32字节字段。

contents.text: DOT11E Data Len: Length of the 802.11e IE.
contents.zh-CHS: DOT11E数据长度：802.11e IE的长度。

contents.text: DOT11E IE: A 32-byte field containing the 802.11e Information Element.
contents.zh-CHS: DOT11E：包含802.11e信息元素的32字节字段。

contents.text: QOS: An 8-bit value specifying the QoS policy to enforce for the station.
contents.zh-CHS: QOS：一个8位值，指定要为站点强制执行的QOS策略。

contents.text: The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Silver (Best Effort)
contents.zh-CHS: 0-银牌（尽力而为）

contents.text: 1 - Gold (Video)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-黄金（视频）

contents.text: 2 - Platinum (Voice)
contents.zh-CHS: 2-白金（语音）

contents.text: 3 - Bronze (Background)
contents.zh-CHS: 3-青铜色（背景）

contents.text: Auth Type: An 8-bit value specifying the station's authentication type.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证类型：一个8位值，指定站点的身份验证类型。

contents.text: The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Open System
contents.zh-CHS: 0-开放系统

contents.text: 1 - WEP Shared Key
contents.zh-CHS: 1-WEP共享密钥

contents.text: 2 - WPA/WPA2 802.1X
contents.zh-CHS: 2-WPA/WPA2 802.1X

contents.text: 3 - WPA/WPA2 PSK
contents.zh-CHS: 3-WPA/WPA2 PSK

contents.text: Broadcast SSID: A Boolean indicating whether the SSID is to be broadcast by the WTP. A value of zero disables SSID broadcast, while a value of one enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 广播SSID：指示SSID是否由WTP广播的布尔值。值为零将禁用SSID广播，而值为1将启用SSID广播。

contents.text: Reserved: A 40-byte reserved field.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：一个40字节的保留字段。

contents.text: SSID: The SSID attribute is the service set identifier that will be advertised by the WTP for this WLAN.
contents.zh-CHS: SSID：SSID属性是WTP将为此WLAN播发的服务集标识符。

contents.text: 11.8.1.2. IEEE 802.11 Delete WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.1.2. IEEE 802.11删除WLAN

contents.text: The Delete WLAN message element is used to inform the WTP that a previously created WLAN is to be deleted. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 删除WLAN消息元素用于通知WTP将删除先前创建的WLAN。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 28 for IEEE 802.11 Delete WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：28适用于IEEE 802.11删除WLAN

contents.text: Length: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：3

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值

contents.text: WLAN ID: A 16-bit value specifying the WLAN Identifier
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：指定WLAN标识符的16位值

contents.text: 11.8.1.3. IEEE 802.11 Update WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.1.3. IEEE 802.11更新无线局域网

contents.text: The Update WLAN message element is used by the AC to define a wireless LAN on the WTP. The value contains the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用更新WLAN消息元素在WTP上定义无线LAN。该值包含以下格式：

contents.text: Type: 34 for IEEE 802.11 Update WLAN
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：34用于IEEE 802.11更新WLAN

contents.text: Length: 43
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：43

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值。

contents.text: WLAN ID: A 16-bit value specifying the WLAN Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：指定WLAN标识符的16位值。

contents.text: Encryption Policy: A 32-bit value specifying the encryption scheme to apply to traffic to and from the mobile station.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密策略：一个32位的值，指定应用于进出移动站的通信量的加密方案。

contents.text: The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Encrypt WEP 104: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 104-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 0-加密WEP 104：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准104位WEP加密。

contents.text: 1 - Clear Text: All packets to/from the mobile station do not require any additional crypto processing by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-明文：所有进出移动站的数据包不需要WTP进行任何额外的加密处理。

contents.text: 2 - Encrypt WEP 40: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 40-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 2-加密WEP 40：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用标准的40位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 3 - Encrypt WEP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a standard 128-bit WEP.
contents.zh-CHS: 3-加密WEP 128：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用标准128位WEP进行加密。

contents.text: 4 - Encrypt AES-CCMP 128: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using a 128-bit AES-CCMP [7].
contents.zh-CHS: 4-加密AES-CCMP 128：必须使用128位AES-CCMP对进出移动站的所有数据包进行加密[7]。

contents.text: 5 - Encrypt TKIP-MIC: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using TKIP and authenticated using Michael [16].
contents.zh-CHS: 5-加密TKIP-MIC：所有进出移动台的数据包必须使用TKIP加密，并使用Michael进行身份验证[16]。

contents.text: 6 - Encrypt CKIP: All packets to/from the mobile station must be encrypted using Cisco TKIP.
contents.zh-CHS: 6-加密CKIP：所有进出移动站的数据包必须使用Cisco TKIP加密。

contents.text: Key: A 32-byte session key to use with the encryption policy.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥：用于加密策略的32字节会话密钥。

contents.text: Key-Index: The Key Index associated with the key.
contents.zh-CHS: 键索引：与键关联的键索引。

contents.text: Shared Key: A 1-byte Boolean that specifies whether the key included in the Key field is a shared WEP key. A value of zero means that the key is not a shared WEP key, while a value of one is used to state that the key is a shared WEP key.
contents.zh-CHS: 共享密钥：一个1字节的布尔值，指定密钥字段中包含的密钥是否为共享WEP密钥。值为零表示该密钥不是共享WEP密钥，而值为1表示该密钥是共享WEP密钥。

contents.text: WLAN Capability: A 16-bit value containing the capabilities to be advertised by the WTP within the Probe and Beacon messages.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN能力：16位值，包含WTP在探测和信标消息中公布的能力。

contents.text: 11.8.2. IEEE 802.11 WLAN Config Response
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.2. IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置响应

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Response is sent by the WTP to the AC as an acknowledgement of the receipt of an IEEE 802.11 WLAN Configuration Request.
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置响应由WTP发送到AC，作为接收IEEE 802.11 WLAN配置请求的确认。

contents.text: This LWAPP control message does not include any message elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 此LWAPP控制消息不包括任何消息元素。

contents.text: 11.8.3. IEEE 802.11 WTP Event
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.3. IEEE 802.11 WTP事件

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 WTP Event LWAPP message is used by the WTP in order to report asynchronous events to the AC. There is no reply message expected from the AC, except that the message is acknowledged via the reliable transport.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP使用IEEE 802.11 WTP事件LWAPP消息向AC报告异步事件。除了通过可靠传输确认消息外，AC不需要回复消息。

contents.text: When the AC receives the IEEE 802.11 WTP Event, it will take whatever action is necessary, depending upon the message elements present in the message.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC接收到IEEE 802.11 WTP事件时，它将根据消息中存在的消息元素采取任何必要的措施。

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 WTP Event message MUST contain one of the following message elements described in the next subsections.
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11 WTP事件消息必须包含下一小节中描述的以下消息元素之一。

contents.text: 11.8.3.1. IEEE 802.11 MIC Countermeasures
The MIC Countermeasures message element is sent by the WTP to the AC to indicate the occurrence of a MIC failure.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP向AC发送MIC对抗消息元素，以指示MIC故障的发生。

contents.text: Type: 61 for IEEE 802.11 MIC Countermeasures
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：用于IEEE 802.11话筒对抗的61

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: WLAN ID: This 8-bit unsigned integer includes the WLAN Identifier, on which the MIC failure occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：此8位无符号整数包括发生麦克风故障的WLAN标识符。

contents.text: MAC Address: The MAC address of the mobile station that caused the MIC failure.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：导致麦克风故障的移动台的MAC地址。

contents.text: 11.8.3.2. IEEE 802.11 WTP Radio Fail Alarm Indication
contents.zh-CHS: 11.8.3.2. IEEE 802.11 WTP无线电故障报警指示

contents.text: The WTP Radio Fail Alarm Indication message element is sent by the WTP to the AC when it detects a radio failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 当WTP检测到无线电故障时，WTP将向AC发送WTP无线电故障报警指示消息元素。

contents.text: Type: 95 for WTP Radio Fail Alarm Indication
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：95，用于WTP无线电故障报警指示

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Type: The type of radio failure detected. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：检测到的无线电故障类型。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - Receiver
contents.zh-CHS: 1-接收器

contents.text: 2 - Transmitter
contents.zh-CHS: 2-发射机

contents.text: Status: An 8-bit Boolean indicating whether the radio failure is being reported or cleared. A value of zero is used to clear the event, while a value of one is used to report the event.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：一个8位布尔值，指示是否正在报告或清除无线电故障。值0用于清除事件，而值1用于报告事件。

contents.text: Pad: Reserved field MUST be set to zero (0).
contents.zh-CHS: Pad：保留字段必须设置为零（0）。

contents.text: 11.9. Message Element Bindings
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9. 消息元素绑定

contents.text: The IEEE 802.11 Message Element binding has the following definitions:
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11消息元素绑定具有以下定义：

contents.text: Conf Conf Conf Add Req Resp Upd Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: Conf Conf Add Req Resp Upd Mobile

contents.text: IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN Radio Configuration X X X IEEE 802.11 Rate Set X X IEEE 802.11 Multi-domain Capability X X X IEEE 802.11 MAC Operation X X X IEEE 802.11 Tx Power X X X IEEE 802.11 Tx Power Level X IEEE 802.11 Direct Sequence Control X X X IEEE 802.11 OFDM Control X X X IEEE 802.11 Supported Rates X X IEEE 802.11 Antenna X X X IEEE 802.11 CFP Status X X IEEE 802.11 Broadcast Probe Mode X X IEEE 802.11 WTP Mode and Type X? X IEEE 802.11 WTP Quality of Service X X IEEE 802.11 MIC Error Report From Mobile X IEEE 802.11 Update Mobile QoS X IEEE 802.11 Mobile Session Key X
contents.zh-CHS: IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN无线电配置X X IEEE 802.11速率集X IEEE 802.11多域能力X X IEEE 802.11 MAC操作X X IEEE 802.11发送功率X X IEEE 802.11发送功率级X IEEE 802.11直接序列控制X X IEEE 802.11 OFDM控制X X X IEEE 802.11支持的速率X IEEE 802.11天线X IEEE 802.11 CFP状态X X IEEE 802.11广播探测模式X X IEEE 802.11 WTP模式和类型X？X IEEE 802.11 WTP服务质量X X来自移动设备的IEEE 802.11 MIC错误报告X IEEE 802.11更新移动QoS X IEEE 802.11移动会话密钥X

contents.text: 11.9.1. IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN Radio Configuration
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.1. IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN无线电配置

contents.text: The WTP WLAN radio configuration is used by the AC to configure a Radio on the WTP. The message element value contains the following Fields:
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用WTP WLAN无线电配置在WTP上配置无线电。消息元素值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 8 for IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN Radio Configuration
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：8用于IEEE 802.11 WTP WLAN无线电配置

contents.text: Length: 20
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：20

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: Occupancy Limit: This attribute indicates the maximum amount of time, in Time Units (TUs), that a point coordinator MAY control the usage of the wireless medium without relinquishing control for long enough to allow at least one instance of Distributed Coordination Function (DCF) access to the medium. The default value of this attribute SHOULD be 100, and the maximum value SHOULD be 1000.
contents.zh-CHS: 占用限制：此属性表示点协调器可以控制无线媒体使用的最大时间量（以时间单位（TU）表示），而无需放弃控制足够长的时间，以允许至少一个分布式协调功能（DCF）实例访问该媒体。此属性的默认值应为100，最大值应为1000。

contents.text: CFP Period: The attribute describes the number of DTIM intervals between the start of Contention-Free Periods (CFPs).
contents.zh-CHS: CFP Period：该属性描述无争用时段（CFP）开始之间的DTIM间隔数。

contents.text: CFP Maximum Duration: The attribute describes the maximum duration of the CFP in TU that MAY be generated by the Point Coordination Function (PCF).
contents.zh-CHS: CFP最大持续时间：该属性描述可能由点协调功能（PCF）生成的以TU为单位的CFP的最大持续时间。

contents.text: BSSID: The WLAN Radio's base MAC address. For WTPs that support more than a single WLAN, the value of the WLAN Identifier is added to the last octet of the BSSID. Therefore, a WTP that supports 16 WLANs MUST have 16 MAC addresses reserved for it, and the last nibble is used to represent the WLAN ID.
contents.zh-CHS: BSSID：WLAN无线电的基本MAC地址。对于支持多个WLAN的WTP，WLAN标识符的值将添加到BSSID的最后八位字节。因此，支持16个WLAN的WTP必须为其保留16个MAC地址，最后一个半字节用于表示WLAN ID。

contents.text: Beacon Period: This attribute specifies the number of TUs that a station uses for scheduling Beacon transmissions. This value is transmitted in Beacon and Probe Response frames.
contents.zh-CHS: 信标周期：该属性指定站点用于调度信标传输的TU数。该值在信标和探测器响应帧中传输。

contents.text: DTIM Period: This attribute specifies the number of Beacon intervals that elapses between transmission of Beacons frames containing a TIM element whose DTIM Count field is 0. This value is transmitted in the DTIM Period field of Beacon frames.
contents.zh-CHS: DTIM Period：此属性指定在传输包含DTIM计数字段为0的TIM元素的信标帧之间经过的信标间隔数。该值在信标帧的DTIM周期字段中传输。

contents.text: Country Code: This attribute identifies the country in which the station is operating. The first two octets of this string is the two-character country code as described in document ISO/IEC 3166- 1. The third octet MUST be one of the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 国家代码：该属性标识站点运行的国家。该字符串的前两个八位字节是文件ISO/IEC 3166-1中描述的两个字符的国家代码。第三个八位组必须是以下之一：

contents.text: 1. an ASCII space character, if the regulations under which the station is operating encompass all environments in the country,
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 一个ASCII空格字符，如果站点运行所依据的法规涵盖该国的所有环境，

contents.text: 2. an ASCII 'O' character, if the regulations under which the station is operating are for an outdoor environment only, or
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 如果车站运行所依据的法规仅适用于室外环境，则为ASCII“O”字符，或

contents.text: 3. an ASCII 'I' character, if the regulations under which the station is operating are for an indoor environment only.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 如果车站运行所依据的法规仅适用于室内环境，则为ASCII“I”字符。

contents.text: Number of BSSIDs: This attribute contains the maximum number of BSSIDs supported by the WTP. This value restricts the number of logical networks supported by the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: BSSID数量：此属性包含WTP支持的最大BSSID数量。此值限制WTP支持的逻辑网络的数量。

contents.text: 11.9.2. IEEE 802.11 Rate Set
The Rate Set message element value is sent by the AC and contains the supported operational rates. It contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 速率设置消息元素值由AC发送，包含支持的运行速率。它包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 16 for IEEE 802.11 Rate Set
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：IEEE 802.11速率集为16

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Rate Set: The AC generates the Rate Set that the WTP is to include in its Beacon and Probe messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 速率集：AC生成WTP将包含在其信标和探测消息中的速率集。

contents.text: 11.9.3. IEEE 802.11 Multi-Domain Capability
The Multi-Domain Capability message element is used by the AC to inform the WTP of regulatory limits. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: AC使用多域能力消息元素通知WTP监管限制。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 10 for IEEE 802.11 Multi-Domain Capability
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：10用于IEEE 802.11多域功能

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: First Channel #: This attribute indicates the value of the lowest channel number in the subband for the associated domain country string.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个频道#：此属性表示关联域国家/地区字符串子带中最低频道编号的值。

contents.text: Number of Channels: This attribute indicates the value of the total number of channels allowed in the subband for the associated domain country string.
contents.zh-CHS: 通道数：此属性表示关联域国家/地区字符串的子带中允许的通道总数的值。

contents.text: Max Tx Power Level: This attribute indicates the maximum transmit power, in dBm, allowed in the subband for the associated domain country string.
contents.zh-CHS: Max Tx Power Level（最大发送功率级别）：此属性表示关联域国家/地区字符串的子频带中允许的最大发送功率（以dBm为单位）。

contents.text: 11.9.4. IEEE 802.11 MAC Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.4. IEEE 802.11 MAC操作

contents.text: The MAC Operation message element is sent by the AC to set the 802.11 MAC parameters on the WTP. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: MAC操作消息元素由AC发送，以在WTP上设置802.11 MAC参数。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 11 for IEEE 802.11 MAC Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：11用于IEEE 802.11 MAC操作

contents.text: Length: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：16

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: RTS Threshold: This attribute indicates the number of octets in a Management Protocol Data Unit (MPDU), below which an RTS/CTS (clear to send) handshake MUST NOT be performed. An RTS/CTS handshake MUST be performed at the beginning of any frame exchange sequence where the MPDU is of type Data or Management, the MPDU has an individual address in the Address1 field, and the length of the MPDU is greater than this threshold. Setting this attribute to be larger than the maximum MAC Service Data Unit (MSDU) size MUST have the effect of turning off the RTS/CTS handshake for frames of Data or Management type transmitted by this Station (STA). Setting this attribute to zero MUST have the effect of
contents.zh-CHS: RTS阈值：此属性表示管理协议数据单元（MPDU）中的八位字节数，低于该八位字节数时，不得执行RTS/CTS（清除发送）握手。RTS/CTS握手必须在任何帧交换序列的开头执行，其中MPDU为数据或管理类型，MPDU在Address1字段中有一个单独的地址，并且MPDU的长度大于该阈值。将此属性设置为大于最大MAC服务数据单元（MSDU）大小必须具有关闭此站点（STA）传输的数据或管理类型帧的RTS/CTS握手的效果。将此属性设置为零必须具有以下效果

contents.text: turning on the RTS/CTS handshake for all frames of Data or Management type transmitted by this STA. The default value of this attribute MUST be 2347.
contents.zh-CHS: 打开此STA传输的所有数据帧或管理类型的RTS/CTS握手。此属性的默认值必须为2347。

contents.text: Short Retry: This attribute indicates the maximum number of transmission attempts of a frame, the length of which is less than or equal to RTSThreshold, that MUST be made before a failure condition is indicated. The default value of this attribute MUST be 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 短期重试：此属性表示在指示故障条件之前，帧长度小于或等于RTSThreshold的最大传输尝试次数。此属性的默认值必须为7。

contents.text: Long Retry: This attribute indicates the maximum number of transmission attempts of a frame, the length of which is greater than dot11RTSThreshold, that MUST be made before a failure condition is indicated. The default value of this attribute MUST be 4.
contents.zh-CHS: Long Retry（长重试）：此属性表示在指示故障条件之前，帧长度大于dot11RTSThreshold的最大传输尝试次数。此属性的默认值必须为4。

contents.text: Fragmentation Threshold: This attribute specifies the current maximum size, in octets, of the MPDU that MAY be delivered to the PHY. An MSDU MUST be broken into fragments if its size exceeds the value of this attribute after adding MAC headers and trailers. An MSDU or MAC Management Protocol Data Unit (MMPDU) MUST be fragmented when the resulting frame has an individual address in the Address1 field, and the length of the frame is larger than this threshold. The default value for this attribute MUST be the lesser of 2346 or the aMPDUMaxLength of the attached PHY and MUST never exceed the lesser of 2346 or the aMPDUMaxLength of the attached PHY. The value of this attribute MUST never be less than 256.
contents.zh-CHS: 碎片阈值：此属性指定可能传送到PHY的MPDU的当前最大大小（以八位字节为单位）。如果在添加MAC标头和尾部后，MSDU的大小超过此属性的值，则必须将其分解为多个片段。当生成的帧在Address1字段中具有单个地址，并且帧的长度大于此阈值时，MSDU或MAC管理协议数据单元（MMPDU）必须分段。此属性的默认值必须是2346或连接的PHY的aMPDUMaxLength中的较小值，并且不得超过2346或连接的PHY的aMPDUMaxLength中的较小值。此属性的值不得小于256。

contents.text: Tx MSDU Lifetime: This attribute specifies the elapsed time in TU, after the initial transmission of an MSDU, after which, further attempts to transmit the MSDU MUST be terminated. The default value of this attribute MUST be 512.
contents.zh-CHS: Tx MSDU LIFET：该属性指定初始传输MSDU后经过的时间（单位：TU），在此时间之后，必须终止传输MSDU的进一步尝试。此属性的默认值必须为512。

contents.text: Rx MSDU Lifetime: This attribute specifies the elapsed time, in TU, after the initial reception of a fragmented MMPDU or MSDU, after which, further attempts to reassemble the MMPDU or MSDU MUST be terminated. The default value MUST be 512.
contents.zh-CHS: Rx MSDU生存期：此属性指定初始接收到碎片化MMPDU或MSDU后经过的时间（单位：TU），此后，必须终止重新组装MMPDU或MSDU的进一步尝试。默认值必须为512。

contents.text: 11.9.5. IEEE 802.11 Tx Power

The Tx Power message element value is bi-directional. When sent by the WTP, it contains the current power level of the radio in question. When sent by the AC, it contains the power level to which the WTP MUST adhere:
contents.zh-CHS: Tx电源信息元素值是双向的。当由WTP发送时，它包含相关无线电的当前功率水平。当由AC发送时，它包含WTP必须遵守的功率级别：

contents.text: Type: 12 for IEEE 802.11 Tx Power
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：12适用于IEEE 802.11 Tx电源

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: Current Tx Power: This attribute contains the transmit output power in mW.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前发送功率：此属性包含以mW为单位的发送输出功率。

contents.text: 11.9.6. IEEE 802.11 Tx Power Level
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.6. IEEE 802.11发送功率电平

contents.text: The Tx Power Level message element is sent by the WTP and contains the different power levels supported. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: Tx功率级别消息元素由WTP发送，包含支持的不同功率级别。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 13 for IEEE 802.11 Tx Power Level
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：13适用于IEEE 802.11 Tx功率电平

contents.text: Length:   >= 4
Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Num Levels: The number of power level attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: Num Levels：电源级别属性的数量。

contents.text: Power Level: Each power level fields contains a supported power level, in mW.
contents.zh-CHS: 功率级：每个功率级字段包含一个支持的功率级，单位为mW。

contents.text: 11.9.7. IEEE 802.11 Direct Sequence Control
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.7. IEEE 802.11直接顺序控制

contents.text: The Direct Sequence Control message element is a bi-directional element. When sent by the WTP, it contains the current state. When sent by the AC, the WTP MUST adhere to the values. This element is only used for 802.11b radios. The value has the following fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 直接序列控制消息元素是双向元素。由WTP发送时，它包含当前状态。当AC发送时，WTP必须遵守这些值。此元件仅用于802.11b无线电。该值包含以下字段。

contents.text: Type: 14 for IEEE 802.11 Direct Sequence Control
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：14用于IEEE 802.11直接顺序控制

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: Current Channel: This attribute contains the current operating frequency channel of the Direct Sequence Spread Spectrum (DSSS) PHY.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前信道：此属性包含直接序列扩频（DSSS）物理层的当前工作频率信道。

contents.text: Current CCA: The current Controlled Channel Access (CCA) method in operation. Valid values are:
contents.zh-CHS: 当前CCA：运行中的当前受控信道访问（CCA）方法。有效值为：

contents.text: 1 - energy detect only (edonly)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-仅限能量检测（仅限edonly）

contents.text: 2 - carrier sense only (csonly)
contents.zh-CHS: 2-仅限载波检测（仅限CSS）

contents.text: 4 - carrier sense and energy detect (edandcs)
contents.zh-CHS: 4-载波检测和能量检测（edandcs）

contents.text: 8 - carrier sense with timer (cswithtimer)
contents.zh-CHS: 8-带定时器的载波检测（cswithtimer）

contents.text: 16 - high-rate carrier sense and energy detect (hrcsanded)
contents.zh-CHS: 16-高速载波检测和能量检测（hrcsanded）

contents.text: Energy Detect Threshold: The current Energy Detect Threshold being used by the DSSS PHY.
contents.zh-CHS: 能量检测阈值：DSSS PHY使用的当前能量检测阈值。

contents.text: 11.9.8. IEEE 802.11 OFDM Control
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.8. ieee802.11ofdm控制

contents.text: The Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing (OFDM) Control message element is a bi-directional element. When sent by the WTP, it contains the current state. When sent by the AC, the WTP MUST adhere to the values. This element is only used for 802.11a radios. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 正交频分复用（OFDM）控制消息元素是双向元素。由WTP发送时，它包含当前状态。当AC发送时，WTP必须遵守这些值。此元件仅用于802.11a无线电。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 15 for IEEE 802.11 OFDM Control
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：15用于IEEE 802.11 OFDM控制

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零

contents.text: Current Channel: This attribute contains the current operating frequency channel of the OFDM PHY.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前信道：该属性包含OFDM PHY的当前工作频率信道。

contents.text: Band Supported: The capability of the OFDM PHY implementation to operate in the three U-NII bands. Coded as an integer value of a 3-bit field as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 频带支持：OFDM PHY实现在三个U-NII频带中运行的能力。编码为3位字段的整数值，如下所示：

contents.text: Bit 0 - capable of operating in the lower (5.15-5.25 GHz) U-NII band
contents.zh-CHS: 位0-能够在较低（5.15-5.25 GHz）的U-NII频带内工作

contents.text: Bit 1 - capable of operating in the middle (5.25-5.35 GHz) U-NII band
contents.zh-CHS: 位1 -能够操作在中间（5.25-5.35GHz）的U-NII波段

contents.text: Bit 2 - capable of operating in the upper (5.725-5.825 GHz) U-NII band
contents.zh-CHS: 第2位-能够在上部（5.725-5.825 GHz）U-NII频段工作

contents.text: For example, for an implementation capable of operating in the lower and mid bands, this attribute would take the value.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，对于能够在较低和中间频带中操作的实现，该属性将采用该值。

contents.text: TI Threshold: The threshold being used to detect a busy medium (frequency). CCA MUST report a busy medium upon detecting the RSSI above this threshold.
contents.zh-CHS: TI阈值：用于检测忙介质（频率）的阈值。CCA必须在检测到高于此阈值的RSSI时报告忙介质。

contents.text: 11.9.9. IEEE 802.11 Antenna

The Antenna message element is communicated by the WTP to the AC to provide information on the antennas available. The AC MAY use this element to reconfigure the WTP's antennas. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 天线消息元素由WTP传送给AC，以提供有关可用天线的信息。AC可使用该元件重新配置WTP的天线。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 41 for IEEE 802.11 Antenna
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：41适用于IEEE 802.11天线

contents.text: Length:   >= 8
Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio to configure.
contents.zh-CHS: Radio ID：表示要配置的无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Diversity: An 8-bit value specifying whether the antenna is to provide receive diversity. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 分集：一个8位值，指定天线是否提供接收分集。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Disabled
contents.zh-CHS: 0-禁用

contents.text: 1 - Enabled (may only be true if the antenna can be used as a receive antenna)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-启用（仅当天线可用作接收天线时才可能为真）

contents.text: Combiner: An 8-bit value specifying the combiner selection. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 组合器：指定组合器选择的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - Sectorized (Left)
contents.zh-CHS: 1-扇区化（左）

contents.text: 2 - Sectorized (Right)
contents.zh-CHS: 2-分区（右）

contents.text: 3 - Omni
contents.zh-CHS: 3-全方位

contents.text: 4 - Mimo
contents.zh-CHS: 4-Mimo

contents.text: Antenna Count: An 8-bit value specifying the number of Antenna Selection fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 天线计数：一个8位值，指定天线选择字段的数量。

contents.text: Antenna Selection: One 8-bit antenna configuration value per antenna in the WTP. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 天线选择：WTP中每个天线一个8位天线配置值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 1 - Internal Antenna
contents.zh-CHS: 1-内部天线

contents.text: 2 - External Antenna
contents.zh-CHS: 2-外部天线

contents.text: 11.9.10. IEEE 802.11 Supported Rates
The Supported Rates message element is sent by the WTP to indicate the rates that it supports. The value contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 受支持的费率消息元素由WTP发送，以指示其支持的费率。该值包含以下字段：

contents.text: Type: 16 for IEEE 802.11 Supported Rates
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：16适用于IEEE 802.11支持的速率

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Radio ID: An 8-bit value representing the radio.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：表示无线电的8位值。

contents.text: Supported Rates: The WTP includes the Supported Rates that its hardware supports. The format is identical to the Rate Set message element.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持的速率：WTP包括其硬件支持的支持速率。格式与“速率设置”消息元素相同。

contents.text: 11.9.11. IEEE 802.11 CFP Status
The CFP Status message element is sent to provide the CF Polling configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送CFP状态消息元素以提供CF轮询配置。

contents.text: Type: 48 for IEEE 802.11 CFP Status
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：48表示IEEE 802.11 CFP状态

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Status: An 8-bit Boolean containing the status of the CF Polling feature. A value of zero disables CFP Status, while a value of one enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：包含CF轮询功能状态的8位布尔值。值为零将禁用CFP状态，而值为1将启用CFP状态。

contents.text: 11.9.12. IEEE 802.11 WTP Mode and Type
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.12. IEEE 802.11 WTP模式和类型

contents.text: The WTP Mode and Type message element is used to configure a WTP to operate in a specific mode.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP模式和类型消息元素用于将WTP配置为在特定模式下运行。

contents.text: Type: 54 for IEEE 802.11 WTP Mode and Type
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：54适用于IEEE 802.11 WTP模式和类型

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Mode: An 8-bit value describing the type of information being sent. The following values are supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 模式：描述所发送信息类型的8位值。支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Split MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 0-拆分MAC

contents.text: 2 - Local MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 2-本地MAC

contents.text: Type: The type field is not currently used.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：当前未使用类型字段。

contents.text: 11.9.13. IEEE 802.11 Broadcast Probe Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.13. IEEE 802.11广播探测模式

contents.text: The Broadcast Probe Mode message element indicates whether a WTP will respond to NULL SSID Probe requests. Since broadcast NULL Probes are not sent to a specific BSSID, the WTP cannot know which SSID the sending station is querying. Therefore, this behavior must be global to the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 广播探测模式消息元素指示WTP是否响应空SSID探测请求。由于广播空探测未发送到特定的BSSID，因此WTP无法知道发送站正在查询哪个SSID。因此，此行为必须是WTP的全局行为。

contents.text: Type: 51 for IEEE 802.11 Broadcast Probe Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：51适用于IEEE 802.11广播探测模式

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Status: An 8-bit Boolean indicating the status of whether a WTP shall respond to a NULL SSID Probe request. A value of zero disables the NULL SSID Probe response, while a value of one enables it.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：一个8位布尔值，指示WTP是否应响应空SSID探测请求的状态。值为零将禁用空SSID探测响应，而值为1将启用它。

contents.text: 11.9.14. IEEE 802.11 WTP Quality of Service
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.14. IEEE 802.11 WTP服务质量

contents.text: The WTP Quality of Service message element value is sent by the AC to the WTP to communicate quality-of-service configuration information.
contents.zh-CHS: WTP服务质量消息元素值由AC发送到WTP，以传达服务质量配置信息。

contents.text: Type: 57 for IEEE 802.11 WTP Quality of Service
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：适用于IEEE 802.11 WTP服务质量的57

contents.text: Length: 12
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：12

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: Tag Packets: A value indicating whether LWAPP packets should be tagged for QoS purposes. The following values are currently supported:
contents.zh-CHS: 标记数据包：一个值，指示是否应为QoS目的标记LWAPP数据包。当前支持以下值：

contents.text: 0 - Untagged
contents.zh-CHS: 0-未标记

contents.text: 2 - DSCP
contents.zh-CHS: 2-DSCP

contents.text: Immediately following the above header is the following data structure. This data structure will be repeated five times, once for every QoS profile. The order of the QoS profiles is Uranium, Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Bronze.
contents.zh-CHS: 紧跟在上述标题之后的是以下数据结构。此数据结构将重复五次，每个QoS配置文件重复一次。QoS剖面的顺序是铀、铂、金、银和青铜。

contents.text: Queue Depth: The number of packets that can be on the specific QoS transmit queue at any given time.
contents.zh-CHS: 队列深度：在任何给定时间，特定QoS传输队列上可以包含的数据包数。

contents.text: CWMin: The Contention Window minimum value for the QoS transmit queue.
contents.zh-CHS: CWMin：QoS传输队列的争用窗口最小值。

contents.text: CWMax: The Contention Window maximum value for the QoS transmit queue.
contents.zh-CHS: CWMax：QoS传输队列的争用窗口最大值。

contents.text: AIFS: The Arbitration Inter Frame Spacing to use for the QoS transmit queue.
contents.zh-CHS: AIFS：用于QoS传输队列的仲裁帧间间隔。

contents.text: CBR: The Constant Bit Rate (CBR) value to observe for the QoS transmit queue.
contents.zh-CHS: CBR：为QoS传输队列观察的恒定比特率（CBR）值。

contents.text: Dot1P Tag: The 802.1P precedence value to use if packets are to be 802.1P tagged.
contents.zh-CHS: Dot1P标记：如果要对数据包进行802.1P标记，则使用的802.1P优先级值。

contents.text: DSCP Tag: The DSCP label to use if packets are to be DSCP tagged.
contents.zh-CHS: DSCP标签：如果要对数据包进行DSCP标记，则要使用的DSCP标签。

contents.text: 11.9.15. IEEE 802.11 MIC Error Report From Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: 11.9.15. 来自移动设备的IEEE 802.11麦克风错误报告

contents.text: The MIC Error Report From Mobile message element is sent by an AC to a WTP when it receives a MIC failure notification via the Error bit in the EAP over LAN (EAPOL)-Key frame.
contents.zh-CHS: 当AC通过EAP over LAN（EAPOL）-关键帧中的错误位接收到麦克风故障通知时，来自移动消息元素的麦克风错误报告由AC发送到WTP。

contents.text: Type: 79 for IEEE 802.11 MIC Error Report From Mobile
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：79用于来自移动设备的IEEE 802.11麦克风错误报告

contents.text: Length: 14
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：14

contents.text: Client MAC Address: The Client MAC address of the station reporting the MIC failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端MAC地址：报告麦克风故障的站点的客户端MAC地址。

contents.text: BSSID: The BSSID on which the MIC failure is being reported.
contents.zh-CHS: BSSID：报告麦克风故障的BSSID。

contents.text: Radio ID: The Radio Identifier, typically refers to some interface index on the WTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线电ID：无线电标识符，通常指WTP上的一些接口索引。

contents.text: WLAN ID: The WLAN ID on which the MIC failure is being reported.
contents.zh-CHS: WLAN ID：报告麦克风故障的WLAN ID。

contents.text: 11.10. IEEE 802.11 Message Element Values
contents.zh-CHS: 11.10. IEEE 802.11消息元素值
